[03] ^b^vīriyārambhakathā^eb^ti ettha vīrassa bhāvo, kammanti vā vīriyaṃ, vidhinā īrayitabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā vīriyaṃ, vīriyañca taṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ^a^P0.0233^ea^ upasampadāya ārambhanaṃ vīriyārambho. svāyaṃ kāyiko cetasiko cāti duvidho, ārambhadhātu, nikkamadhātu, parakkamadhātu cāti tividho; sammappadhānavasena catubbidho. so sabbopi yo bhikkhu ^a^V0.0189^ea^ gamane uppannaṃ kilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti; ṭhāne uppannaṃ nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya uppannaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, tattha tattheva ajapadena daṇḍena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya, tikhiṇena asinā amittaṃ gīvāya paharanto viya ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā vīriyabalena niggaṇhāti, tassevaṃ āraddhavīriyassa vasena veditabbo. tappaṭisaṃyuttā kathā ^b^vīriyārambhakathā^eb^.

[03] ^b^sīlakathā^eb^dīsu duvidhaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca. tattha lokiyaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarādi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ, lokuttaraṃ maggasīlaṃ phalasīlañca. tathā vipassanāya pādakabhūtā saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo lokiyo samādhi, maggasampayutto panettha lokuttaro samādhi nāma. tathā ^b^paññā^eb^pi lokiyā sutamayā cintāmayā jhānasampayuttā vipassanāñāṇañca. visesato panettha vipassanāpaññā gahetabbā, lokuttarā maggapaññā phalapaññā ca. ^b^vimuttī^eb^pi ariyaphalavimutti nibbānañca. apare pana tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedavimuttīnampi vasenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇenti. ^b^vimuttiñāṇadassana^eb^mpi ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. iti imesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ ^a^M0.0212^ea^ saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokārāanisaṃsavibhāvanavasena ceva tappaṭipakkhānaṃ dussīlyādīnaṃ ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā, tappaṭisaṃyuttā kathā vā ^b^sīlādikathā^eb^ nāma.

[03] ettha ca ``attanā ca appiccho hoti, appicchakathañca paresaṃ kattā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.252; a0 ni0 10.70) ``santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.144; cūḷani0 khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 128) ca ādivacanato sayañca appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatena paresampi tadatthāya hitajjhāsayena pavattetabbā tathārūpī kathā, yā idha abhisallekhikādibhāvena visesetvā vuttā appicchakathādīti veditabbā. kārakasseva hi kathā visesato adhippetatthasādhinī. tathā hi vakkhati ``kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ...pe0 ^a^P0.0234^ea^... akasiralābhī''ti.

[03] ^b^evarūpāyā^eb^ti īdisāya, yathāvuttāya. ^b^nikāmalābhī^eb^ti yathicchitalābhī yathārucilābhī, sabbakālaṃ imā kathā sotuṃ vicāretuñca yathāsukhaṃ labhanto. ^b^akicchalābhī^eb^ti niddukkhalābhī. ^b^akasiralābhī^eb^ti vipulalābhī.

[03] ^b^āraddhavīriyo^eb^ti paggahitavīriyo. ^b^akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāyā^eb^ti akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalānaṃ ^a^V0.0190^ea^ pāpadhammānaṃ pajahanatthāya. ^b^kusalānaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti kucchitānaṃ salanādiatthena anavajjaṭṭhena ca kusalānaṃ sahavipassanānaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ. ^b^upasampadāyā^eb^ti sampādanāya, attano santāne uppādanāya. ^b^thāmavā^eb^ti ussoḷhisaṅkhātena vīriyathāmena samannāgato. ^b^daḷhaparakkamo^eb^ti thiraparakkamo asithilavīriyo. ^b^anikkhittadhuro^eb^ti anorohitadhuro anosakkitavīriyo.

[03] ^b^paññavā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya paññavā. ^b^udayatthagāminiyā^eb^ti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhantiyā. ^b^ariyāyā^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena kilesehi ārakā dūre ṭhitāya niddosāya. ^b^nibbedhikāyā^eb^ti nibbedhabhāgiyāya. ^b^sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa khepanato ``dukkhakkhayo''ti laddhanāmaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sammā hetunā ñāyena gacchantiyā.

[03] imesu ca pana pañcasu dhammesu sīlaṃ vīriyaṃ paññā ca yogino ajjhattikaṃ aṅgaṃ, itaradvayaṃ bāhiraṃ aṅgaṃ. tathāpi kalyāṇamittasannissayeneva sesaṃ ^a^M0.0213^ea^ catubbidhaṃ ijjhati, kalyāṇamittassevettha bahūpakārataṃ dassento satthā ^b^``kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkha''^eb^ntiādinā desanaṃ vaḍḍheti. tattha ^b^pāṭikaṅkha^eb^nti ekaṃsena icchitabbaṃ, avassaṃbhāvīti attho. ^b^ya^eb^nti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ``sīlavā bhavissatī''ti ettha yadetaṃ kalyāṇamittassa bhikkhuno sīlavantatāya bhavanaṃ sīlasampannattaṃ, tassa bhikkhuno sīlasampannattā etaṃ tassa pāṭikaṅkhaṃ, avassaṃbhāvī ekaṃseneva tassa tattha niyojanatoti adhippāyo. ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharissatī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03] evaṃ ^a^P0.0235^ea^ bhagavā sadevake loke uttamakalyāṇamittasaṅkhātassa attano vacanaṃ anādiyitvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā tādisaṃ vippakāraṃ pattassa āyasmato meghiyassa kalyāṇamittatādinā sakalaṃ sāsanasampattiṃ dassetvā, idānissa tattha ādarajātassa pubbe yehi kāmavitakkādīhi upaddutattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajji, tassa tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtattā ca bhāvanānayaṃ pakāsetvā, tato paraṃ arahattassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto, ^b^``tena ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tenā^eb^ti evaṃ kalyāṇamittasannissayena yathāvuttasīlādiguṇasamannāgatena. tenevāha ^b^``imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^uttarī^eb^ti āraddhataruṇavipassanassa rāgādiparissayā ce uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tato uddhaṃ ^b^cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā^eb^ uppādetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā ca.

[03] ^b^asubhā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0191^ea^ ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yattha katthaci asubhabhāvanā. ^b^rāgassa pahānāyā^eb^ti kāmarāgassa pajahanatthāya. ayamattho sālilāyakopamāya vibhāvetabbo -- eko hi puriso asitaṃ gahetvā koṭito paṭṭhāya sālikhette sāliyo lāyati, athassa vatiṃ bhinditvā gāvo pavisiṃsu. so asitaṃ ṭhapetvā, yaṭṭhiṃ ādāya, teneva maggena gāvo nīharitvā, vatiṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, puna asitaṃ gahetvā sāliyo lāyi. tattha sālikhettaṃ viya buddhasāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sālilāyako viya yogāvacaro, asitaṃ viya paññā, lāyanakālo viya vipassanāya kammakaraṇakālo, yaṭṭhi viya asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ, vati viya saṃvaro ^a^M0.0214^ea^, vatiṃ bhinditvā gāvīnaṃ pavisanaṃ viya sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya pamādaṃ āgamma rāgassa uppajjanaṃ, asitaṃ ṭhapetvā, yaṭṭhiṃ ādāya, paviṭṭhamaggeneva gāvo nīharitvā, vatiṃ paṭipākatikaṃ katvā, puna ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sālilāyanaṃ viya asubhakammaṭṭhānena rāgaṃ vikkhambhetvā, puna vipassanāya kammakaraṇakāloti idamettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. evaṃbhūtaṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāyā''ti.

[03] ^b^mettā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0236^ea^ mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^byāpādassa pahānāyā^eb^ti vuttanayeneva uppannakopassa pajahanatthāya. ^b^ānāpānassatī^eb^ti soḷasavatthukā ānāpānassati. ^b^vitakkupacchedāyā^eb^ti vuttanayeneva uppannānaṃ vitakkānaṃ upacchedanatthāya. ^b^asmimānasamugghātāyā^eb^ti asmīti uppajjanakassa navavidhassa mānassa samucchedanatthāya. ^b^aniccasaññino^eb^ti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato pabhaṅguto tāvakālikato niccappaṭipakkhato ca ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti (dha0 pa0 277; cūḷani0 hemakamāṇavapucchāniddesa 56) pavattāniccānupassanāvasena aniccasaññino. ^b^anattasaññā saṇṭhātī^eb^ti asārakato avasavattanato parato rittato tucchato suññato ca ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti (dha0 pa0 279; cūḷani0 hemakamāṇavapucchāniddesa 56) evaṃ pavattā anattānupassanāsaṅkhātā anattasaññā citte saṇṭhahati, atidaḷhaṃ patiṭṭhāti. aniccalakkhaṇe hi diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. tīsu hi lakkhaṇesu ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``aniccasaññino hi, meghiya, anattasaññā saṇṭhātī''^eb^ti. anattalakkhaṇe diṭṭhe asmīti uppajjanakamāno suppajahova hotīti āha -- ^b^``anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī''^eb^ti ^b^diṭṭheva dhamme nibbāna^eb^nti diṭṭheyeva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve apaccayaparinibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana asubhādibhāvanānayo visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.102) vuttanayena gahetabbo.

[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0192^ea^ ^b^viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ āyasmato meghiyassa micchāvitakkacorehi kusalabhaṇḍupacchedasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jānitvā. ^b^imaṃ udāna^eb^nti imaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ avinodane vinodane ca ādīnavānisaṃsadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0215^ea^ ^b^khuddā^eb^ti hīnā lāmakā. ^b^vitakkā^eb^ti kāmavitakkādayo tayo pāpavitakkā. te hi sabbavitakkehi patikiṭṭhatāya idha khuddāti vuttā ``na ca khuddamācare''tiādīsu (khu0 pā0 9.3; su0 ni0 145) viya. ^b^sukhumā^eb^ti ñātivitakkādayo adhippetā. ñātivitakko janapadavitakko amarāvitakko parānuddayatāya paṭisaṃyutto vitakko lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakkoti ete hi vitakkā kāmavitakkādayo viya ^a^P0.0237^ea^ dāruṇā na hontīti anoḷārikasabhāvatāya sukhumāti vuttā. ^b^anugatā^eb^ti cittena anuvattitā. vitakke hi uppajjamāne cittaṃ tadanugatameva hoti tassa ārammaṇābhiniropanato. ``anuggatā''tipi pāḷi, anūṭṭhitāti attho. ^b^manaso uppilāvā^eb^ti cetaso uppilāvitattakarā.

[03] ^b^ete avidvā manaso vitakke^eb^ti ete kāmavitakkādike manovitakke assādādīnavanissaraṇato ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto. ^b^hurā huraṃ dhāvati bhantacitto^eb^ti appahīnamicchāvitakkattā anavaṭṭhitacitto ``kadāci rūpe, kadāci sadde''tiādinā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe assādādivasena aparāparaṃ dhāvati paribbhamati. atha vā ^b^hurā huraṃ dhāvati bhantacitto^eb^ti apariññātavitakkattā tannimittānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ vasena paribbhamanamānaso idhalokato paralokaṃ ādānanikkhepehi aparāparaṃ dhāvati saṃsaratīti attho.

[03] ^b^ete ca vidvā manaso vitakke^eb^ti ete yathāvuttappabhede kāmavitakkādike manovitakke assādādito yathābhūtaṃ jānanto. ^b^ātāpiyo^eb^ti vīriyavā. ^b^saṃvaratī^eb^ti pidahati. ^b^satimā^eb^ti satisampanno. ^b^anuggate^eb^ti dullabhavasena anuppanne. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ete vuttappakāre kāmavitakkādike manovitakke cittassa uppilāvitahetutāya manaso uppilāve vidvā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya sammadeva jānanto, tassa sahāyabhūtānaṃ sammāvāyāmasatīnaṃ atthitāya ātāpiyo satimā te ariyamaggabhāvanāya āyatiṃ uppattirahe anuggate anuppanne eva maggakkhaṇe saṃvarati, ñāṇasaṃvaravasena pidahati, āgamanapathaṃ ^a^M0.0216^ea^ pacchindati, evaṃbhūto ca catusaccappabodhena ^b^buddho^eb^ ariyasāvako arahattādhigamena ^a^P0.0238^ea^ ^b^asesaṃ,^eb^ anavasesaṃ ^a^V0.0193^ea^ ^b^ete^eb^ kāmavitakkādike ^b^pajahāsi^eb^ samucchindīti. etthāpi ``anugate''tipi paṭhanti. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
[06] paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^kusinārāya^eb^nti kusinārāyaṃ nāma mallarājūnaṃ nagare. ^b^upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane^eb^ti yathā hi anurādhapurassa thūpārāmo, evaṃ kusinārāya uyyānaṃ dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya hoti. yathā thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagarapavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati, evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā, tasmā ``upavattana''nti vuccati. tasmiṃ upavattane mallarājūnaṃ sālavane. ^b^araññakuṭikāya^eb^nti sālapantiyā avidūre rukkhagacchasañchannaṭṭhāne katā kuṭikā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``araññakuṭikāyaṃ viharatī''ti. te pana bhikkhū paṭisaṅkhānavirahitā ossaṭṭhavīriyā pamattavihārino, tena vuttaṃ ^b^``uddhatā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha uddhaccabahulattā avūpasantacittatāya ^b^uddhatā^eb^. tucchabhāvena māno naḷo viyāti naḷo, mānasaṅkhāto uggato naḷo etesanti ^b^unnaḷā,^eb^ uggatatucchamānāti attho. pattacīvaramaṇḍanādicāpallena samannāgatattā bahukatāya vā ^b^capalā^eb^. pharusavācatāya mukhena kharāti ^b^mukharā^eb^. tiracchānakathābahulatāya vikiṇṇā byākulā vācā etesanti ^b^vikiṇṇavācā^eb^. muṭṭhā naṭṭhā sati etesanti ^b^muṭṭhassatino,^eb^ sativirahitā pamādavihārinoti attho. sabbena sabbaṃ sampajaññābhāvato ^b^asampajānā^eb^. gaddūhanamattampi ^a^P0.0239^ea^ kālaṃ cittasamādhānassa abhāvato na samāhitāti ^b^asamāhitā^eb^. lolasabhāvattā bhantamigasappaṭibhāgatāya ^b^vibbhantacittā^eb^. manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ asaṃvaraṇato asaññatindriyatāya ^b^pākatindriyā^eb^.

[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0217^ea^ ^b^viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddhaccādivasena pamādavihāraṃ jānitvā. ^b^imaṃ udāna^eb^nti imaṃ pamādavihāre appamādavihāre ca yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0194^ea^ ^b^arakkhitenā^eb^ti satiārakkhābhāvena aguttena. ^b^kāyenā^eb^ti chaviññāṇakāyena cakkhuviññāṇena hi rūpaṃ disvā tattha nimittānubyañjanaggahaṇavasena abhijjhādipavattito viññāṇadvārassa satiyā arakkhitabhāvato. sotaviññāṇādīsupi eseva nayo. evaṃ chaviññāṇakāyassa arakkhitabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha ``arakkhitena kāyenā''ti. keci pana ``kāyenā''ti atthaṃ vadanti, tesampi vuttanayeneva atthayojanāya sati yujjeyya. apare pana ``arakkhitena cittenā''ti paṭhanti, tesampi vuttanayo eva attho. ^b^micchādiṭṭhihatenā^eb^ti sassatādimicchābhinivesadūsitena. ^b^thinamiddhābhibhūtenā^eb^ti cittassa akalyatālakkhaṇena thinena kāyassa akalyatālakkhaṇena middhena ca ajjhotthaṭena, tena kāyena cittenāti vā sambandho. ^b^vasaṃ mārassa gacchatī^eb^ti kilesamārādikassa sabbassapi mārassa vasaṃ yathākāmakaraṇīyataṃ upagacchati, tesaṃ visayaṃ nātikkamatīti attho.

[03] imāya hi gāthāya bhagavā ye satiārakkhābhāvena sabbaso arakkhitacittā, yonisomanasikārassa hetubhūtāya paññāya abhāvato ayoniso ummujjanena niccantiādinā vipariyesagāhino, tato eva kusalakiriyāya vīriyārambhābhāvato kosajjābhibhūtā saṃsāravaṭṭato sīsaṃ na ukkhipissantīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pamādavihāragarahāmukhena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^``tasmā rakkhitacittassā''^eb^ti dutiyagāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^tasmā rakkhitacittassā^eb^ti yasmā arakkhitacitto mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo hutvā saṃsāreyeva hoti, tasmā satisaṃvarena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ rakkhaṇena pidahanena rakkhitacitto assa. citte hi rakkhite cakkhādīndriyāni ^a^P0.0240^ea^ rakkhitāneva hontīti. ^b^sammāsaṅkappagocaro^eb^ti yasmā micchāsaṅkappagocaro tathā tathā ayoniso vitakketvā nānāvidhāni micchādassanāni gaṇhanto micchādiṭṭhihatena cittena ^a^M0.0218^ea^ mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo hoti, tasmā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto nekkhammasaṅkappādisammāsaṅkappagocaro assa, jhānādisampayuttaṃ sammāsaṅkappameva attano cittassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ kareyya. ^b^sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro^eb^ti sammāsaṅkappagocaratāya vidhūtamicchādassano puretaraṃyeva kammassakatālakkhaṇaṃ, tato yathābhūtañāṇalakkhaṇañca sammādiṭṭhiṃ purato katvā pubbe vuttanayeneva sīlasamādhīsu yutto payutto vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā saṅkhāre sammasanto ^b^ñatvāna udayabbayaṃ^eb^ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu samapaññāsāya ākārehi uppādanirodhaṃ vavatthapetvā udayabbayañāṇamadhigantvā tato paraṃ bhaṅgānupassanādivasena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā anukkamena ariyamaggaṃ gaṇhanto aggamaggena, ^b^thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhu sabbā duggatiyo jahe^eb^ti, evaṃ so heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭhamameva ^a^V0.0195^ea^ pahīnattā diṭṭhivippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu uppajjanakathinamiddhānaṃ adhigatena arahattamaggena samucchindanato tadekaṭṭhānaṃ mānādīnampi pahīnattā sabbaso bhinnakileso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tividhadukkhatāyogena duggatisaṅkhātā sabbāpi gatiyo ucchinnabhavamūlattā ^b^jahe,^eb^ pajaheyya. tāsaṃ parabhāge nibbāne patiṭṭheyyāti attho.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^kosalesū^eb^ti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ``kosalā''tveva vuccati, tesu kosalesu janapade. ^b^cārikaṃ caratī^eb^ti aturitacārikāvasena ^a^P0.0241^ea^ janapadacārikaṃ carati. ^b^mahatā^eb^ti guṇamahattenapi mahatā, aparicchinnasaṅkhyattā saṅkhyāmahattenapi mahatā. ^b^bhikkhusaṅghenā^eb^ti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṃhatena samaṇagaṇena. ^b^saddhi^eb^nti ekato. ^b^maggā okkammā^eb^ti maggato apakkamitvā. ^b^aññataraṃ rukkhamūla^eb^nti ghanapattasākhāviṭapasampannassa sandacchāyassa mahato rukkhassa samīpasaṅkhātaṃ mūlaṃ.

[03] ^b^aññataro gopālako^eb^ti eko gogaṇarakkhako, nāmena pana nando nāma. so kira aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo, yathā keṇiyo ^a^M0.0219^ea^ jaṭilo pabbajjāvasena, evaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa goyūthaṃ rakkhanto gopālakattena rājapīḷaṃ apaharanto attano kuṭumbaṃ rakkhati. so kālena kālaṃ pañca gorase gahetvā, mahāseṭṭhissa santikaṃ āgantvā niyyātetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā, satthāraṃ passati, dhammaṃ suṇāti, attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgamanatthāya satthāraṃ yācati. satthā tasseva ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno agantvā, aparabhāge mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto janapadacārikaṃ caranto, ``idānissa ñāṇaṃ paripakka''nti ñatvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānassa avidūre maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi tassa āgamanaṃ āgamayamāno. nandopi kho ``satthā kira janapadacārikaṃ caranto ito āgacchatī''ti sutvā, haṭṭhatuṭṭho vegena gantvā, satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisīdi, athassa bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. so sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ pāyāsadānamadāsi, sattame ^a^V0.0196^ea^ divase bhagavā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ gopālakaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi...pe0... uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmī''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ^a^P0.0242^ea^ ^b^sandassesī^eb^ti ``ime dhammā kusalā, ime dhammā akusalā''tiādinā kusalādidhamme kammavipāke idhalokaparaloke paccakkhato dassento anupubbikathāvasāne cattāri ariyasaccāni sammā dassesi. ^b^samādapesī^eb^ti ``saccādhigamāya ime nāma dhammā attani uppādetabbā''ti sīlādidhamme sammā gaṇhāpetvā tesu taṃ patiṭṭhapesi. ^b^samuttejesī^eb^ti te dhammā samādinnā anukkamena bhāviyamānā nibbedhabhāgiyā hutvā tikkhavisadā yathā khippaṃ ariyamaggaṃ āvahanti, tathā sammā uttejesi sammadeva tejesi. ^b^sampahaṃsesī^eb^ti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesabhāvadassanena cittassa pamodāpanavasena suṭṭhu pahaṃsesi. apicettha sāvajjānavajjadhammesu dukkhādīsu ca sammohavinodanena sandassanaṃ, sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ pamādāpanodanena samādapanaṃ, cittassālasiyāpattivinodanena samuttejanaṃ, sammāpaṭipattisiddhiyā sampahaṃsanaṃ veditabbaṃ. evaṃ so bhagavato sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. ^b^adhivāsesī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0220^ea^ tena diṭṭhasaccena ``adhivāsetu me, bhante bhagavā''tiādinā nimantito kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopento citteneva adhivāsesi sādiyi. tenevāha ^b^``tuṇhībhāvenā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^appodakapāyāsa^eb^nti nirudakapāyāsaṃ. ^b^paṭiyādāpetvā^eb^ti sampādetvā sajjetvā. ^b^navañca sappi^eb^nti navanītaṃ gahetvā tāvadeva vilīnaṃ maṇḍasappiñca paṭiyādāpetvā. ^b^sahatthā^eb^ti ādarajāto sahattheneva parivisanto. ^b^santappesī^eb^ti paṭiyattaṃ bhojanaṃ bhojesi. ^b^sampavāresī^eb^ti ``alaṃ ala''nti vācāya paṭikkhipāpesi. ^b^bhuttāvi^eb^nti katabhattakiccaṃ. ^b^onītapattapāṇi^eb^nti pattato apanītapāṇiṃ, ``dhotapattapāṇi''ntipi pāṭho, dhotapattahatthanti attho. ^b^nīca^eb^nti anuccaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā āsaneyeva nisīdanaṃ ariyadesavāsīnaṃ cārittaṃ, so pana satthu santike upacāravasena paññattassa dāruphalakāsanassa samīpe nisīdi. ^b^dhammiyā kathāyā^eb^tiādi sattame divase kataṃ anumodanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^a^P0.0243^ea^. so kira sattāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca tattha vasāpetvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi. sattame pana divase appodakapāyāsadānaṃ adāsi. satthā tassa tasmiṃ attabhāve uparimaggatthāya ñāṇaparipākābhāvato anumodanameva katvā pakkāmi.

[03] ^b^sīmantarikāyā^eb^ti sīmantare, tassa gāmassa antaraṃ. gāmavāsino kira ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya tena saddhiṃ kalahaṃ akaṃsu. so te abhibhavitvā taṃ taḷākaṃ gaṇhi. tena baddhāghāto ^a^V0.0197^ea^ eko puriso taṃ satthu pattaṃ gahetvā dūraṃ anugantvā ``nivattāhi upāsakā''ti vutte bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā yāva dassanūpacārasamatikkamā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi paggayha paṭinivattitvā dvinnaṃ gāmānaṃ antare araññappadese ekakaṃ gacchantaṃ sarena vijjhitvā māresi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^acirapakkantassa...pe0... voropesī''^eb^ti. kenacideva karaṇīyena ohīyitvā pacchā gacchantā bhikkhū taṃ tathā mataṃ disvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ viditvā^eb^ti yasmā diṭṭhisampannaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ nandaṃ mārentena purisena ānantariyakammaṃ bahulaṃ apuññaṃ pasutaṃ, tasmā yaṃ corehi ca verīhi ca kattabbaṃ, tatopi ghorataraṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ karotīti imamatthaṃ jānitvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0221^ea^ ^b^diso disa^eb^nti dūsako dūsanīyaṃ coro coraṃ, disvāti vacanaseso. ^b^yaṃ taṃ kayirā^eb^ti yaṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya, dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- eko ekassa mittadubbhī coro puttadārakhettavatthugomahiṃsādīsu aparajjhanto yassa aparajjhati, tampi tatheva attani aparajjhantaṃ coraṃ disvā, verī vā pana kenacideva kāraṇena baddhaveraṃ veriṃ disvā attano kakkhaḷatāya dāruṇatāya yaṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya, puttadāraṃ vā pīḷeyya, khettādīni vā nāseyya, jīvitā vā voropeyya ^a^P0.0244^ea^, dasasu akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitattā ^b^micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ pāpiyo naṃ tato kare,^eb^ naṃ purisaṃ pāpataraṃ tato kareyya. vuttappakāro hi diso vā verī vā disassa vā verino vā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhaṃ vā uppādeyya, jīvitakkhayaṃ vā kareyya. idaṃ pana akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti, attabhāvasatasahassesupi catūsu apāyesu khipitvā sīsamassa ukkhipituṃ na detīti.
[06] tatiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V0.0198^ea^ ^b^kapotakandarāya^eb^nti evaṃnāmake vihāre. tasmiṃ kira pabbatakandare pubbe bahū kapotā vasiṃsu, tena sā pabbatakandarā ``kapotakandarā''ti vuccati. aparabhāge tattha katavihāropi ``kapotakandarā''tveva paññāyittha. tena vuttaṃ -- ``kapotakandarāyanti evaṃnāmake vihāre''ti. ^b^juṇhāya rattiyā^eb^ti sukkapakkharattiyaṃ. ^b^navoropitehi kesehī^eb^ti aciraohāritehi kesehi, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^abbhokāse^eb^ti yattha uparicchadanaṃ parikkhepo vā natthi, tādise ākāsaṅgaṇe.

[03] tattha āyasmā sāriputto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, āyasmā mahāmoggallāno nīluppalavaṇṇo. ubhopi pana te mahātherā udiccabrāhmaṇajaccā kappānaṃ satasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ abhinīhārasampannā chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidāppattā mahākhīṇāsavā samāpattilābhino sattasaṭṭhiyā ^a^M0.0222^ea^ sāvakapāramiñāṇānaṃ matthakappattā etaṃ kapotakandaravihāraṃ upasobhayantā ekaṃ kanakaguhaṃ paviṭṭhā dve sīhā viya, ekaṃ vijambhanabhūmiṃ otiṇṇā dve byagghā viya, ekaṃ supupphitasālavanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve chaddantanāgarājāno viya, ekaṃ simbalivanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve supaṇṇarājāno viya, ekaṃ naravāhanayānaṃ abhiruḷhā dve vessavaṇā viya, ekaṃ paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ abhinisinnā dve sakkā ^a^P0.0245^ea^ viya, ekavimānabbhantaragatā dve mahābrahmāno viya, ekasmiṃ gaganaṭṭhāne ṭhitāni dve candamaṇḍalāni viya, dve sūriyamaṇḍalāni viya ca virociṃsu. tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallāno tuṇhī nisīdi, āyasmā pana sāriputto samāpajji. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ^b^aññataraṃ samādhi^eb^nti upekkhābrahmavihārasamāpattiṃ. keci ``saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti''nti vadanti, apare panāhu ``āruppapādakaṃ phalasamāpatti''nti. imā eva hi tisso kāyarakkhaṇasamatthā samāpattiyo. tattha nirodhasamāpattiyā samādhipariyāyasambhavo heṭṭhā vuttova, pacchimaṃyeva pana ācariyā vaṇṇenti. ^b^uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti uttarāya disāya yakkhasamāgamaṃ gantvā attano bhavanaṃ gantuṃ dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchanti. ^b^paṭibhāti ma^eb^nti upaṭṭhāti mama. ^b^ma^eb^nti hi paṭisaddayogena sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ, imassa sīse pahāraṃ dātuṃ cittaṃ me uppajjatīti attho. so kira purimajātiyaṃ there baddhāghāto, tenassa theraṃ disvā paduṭṭhacittassa evaṃ ahosi. itaro pana sappaññajātiko, tasmā taṃ paṭisedhento ^a^V0.0199^ea^ ^b^``alaṃ sammā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^mā āsādesī^eb^ti mā ghaṭṭesi, mā pahāraṃ dehīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^uḷāro^eb^ti uḷārehi uttamehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgato.

[03] ^b^anādiyitvā^eb^ti ādaraṃ akatvā, tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā. yasmā pana tassa vacanaṃ aggaṇhanto taṃ anādiyanto nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ -- ``taṃ yakkhaṃ anādiyitvā''ti. ^b^sīse pahāraṃ adāsī^eb^ti sabbathāmena ussāhaṃ janetvā ākāse ṭhitova sīse khaṭakaṃ adāsi, muddhani muṭṭhighātaṃ akāsīti attho. ^b^tāva mahā^eb^ti thāmamahattena tattakaṃ mahanto pahāro ahosi. ^b^tena pahārenā^eb^ti tena pahārena karaṇabhūtena. ^b^sattaratana^eb^nti pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa ratanena sattaratanaṃ. ^b^nāga^eb^nti hatthināgaṃ. ^b^osādeyyā^eb^ti pathaviyaṃ ^a^P0.0246^ea^ osīdāpeyya nimujjāpeyya. ``osāreyyā''tipi ^a^M0.0223^ea^ pāṭho, cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kareyyāti attho. ^b^aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratana^eb^nti aḍḍhena aṭṭhannaṃ pūraṇāni aḍḍhaṭṭhamāni, aḍḍhaṭṭhamāni ratanāni pamāṇaṃ etassāti aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratano, taṃ aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanaṃ. ^b^mahantaṃ pabbatakūṭa^eb^nti kelāsakūṭappamāṇaṃ vipulaṃ girikūṭaṃ. ^b^padāleyyā^eb^ti sakalikākārena bhindeyya. api osādeyya, api padāleyyāti sambandho.

[03] tāvadeva cassa sarīre mahāpariḷāho uppajji, so vedanāturo ākāse ṭhātuṃ asakkonto bhūmiyaṃ pati, taṅkhaṇaññeva aṭṭhasaṭṭhisahassādhikayojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sinerumpi pabbatarājānaṃ sandhārentī catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā mahāpathavī taṃ pāpasattaṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya vivaramadāsi. avīcito jālā uṭṭhahitvā kandantaṃyeva taṃ gaṇhiṃsu, so kandanto vippalapanto pati. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``atha ca pana so yakkho `ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī'ti vatvā tattheva mahānirayaṃ apatāsī^eb^ti. tattha ^b^apatāsī^eb^ti apati.

[03] kiṃ pana so yakkhattabhāveneva nirayaṃ upagacchīti? na upagacchi, yañhettha diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ pāpakammaṃ ahosi, tassa balena yakkhattabhāve mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavi. yaṃ pana upapajjavedanīyaṃ ānantariyakammaṃ, tena cutianantaraṃ niraye uppajjīti. therassa pana samāpattibalena upatthambhitasarīrassa na koci vikāro ahosi. samāpattito avuṭṭhitakāle hi taṃ yakkho pahari, tathā paharantaṃ dibbacakkhunā disvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkami, upasaṅkamanasamakālameva ca dhammasenāpati samāpattito uṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ mahāmoggallāno sarīravuttiṃ pucchi, sopissa byākāsi, tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno...pe0... api ca me sīsaṃ thokaṃ dukkha''^eb^nti.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0200^ea^ ^b^thokaṃ dukkha^eb^nti thokaṃ appamattakaṃ madhurakajātaṃ viya me sīsaṃ dukkhitaṃ, dukkhappattanti ^a^P0.0247^ea^ attho. dukkhādhiṭṭhānañhi sīsaṃ dukkhanti vuttaṃ. ``sīse thokaṃ dukkha''ntipi pāṭho. kathaṃ pana samāpattibalena sarīre upatthambhite therassa sīse thokampi dukkhaṃ ahosīti? acireneva vuṭṭhitattā. antosamāpattiyaṃ ^a^M0.0224^ea^ apaññāyamānadukkhañhi kāyanissitattā niddaṃ upagatassa makasādijanitaṃ viya paṭibuddhassa thokaṃ paññāyittha.

[03] ``mahābalena yakkhena tathā sabbussāhena pahaṭe sarīrepi vikāro nāma natthī''ti acchariyabbhutacittajātena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena ^b^``acchariyaṃ, āvuso sāriputtā''^eb^tiādinā dhammasenāpatino mahānubhāvatāya vibhāvitāya sopissa ^b^`acchariyaṃ, āvuso moggallānā''^eb^tiādinā iddhānubhāvamahantatāpakāsanāpadesena attano issāmacchariyāhaṅkārādimalānaṃ suppahīnataṃ dīpeti. ^b^paṃsupisācakampi na passāmā^eb^ti saṅkārakūṭādīsu vicaraṇakakhuddakapetampi na passāma. iti adhigamappicchānaṃ aggabhūto mahāthero tasmiṃ kāle anāvajjanena tesaṃ adassanaṃ sandhāya vadati. tenevāha ^b^``etarahī''^eb^ti.
[03] bhagavā pana veḷuvane ṭhito ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ dibbasotena assosi. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``assosi kho bhagavā''^eb^tiādi, taṃ vuttatthameva.
[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa samāpattibalūpagataṃ iddhānubhāvamahantataṃ viditvā. ^b^imaṃ udāna^eb^nti tasseva tādibhāvappattidīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] tattha ^b^yassa selūpamaṃ cittaṃ, ṭhitaṃ nānupakampatī^eb^ti yassa khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ ekagghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṃ sabbesaṃ iñjanānaṃ abhāvato vasībhāvappattiyāva ṭhitaṃ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānupakampati na pavedhati. idānissa akampanākāraṃ saddhiṃ kāraṇena dassetuṃ ^b^``viratta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^virattaṃ rajanīyesū^eb^ti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu virattaṃ, tattha sabbaso samucchinnarāganti attho. ^b^kopaneyye^eb^ti paṭighaṭṭhānīye sabbasmimpi āghātavatthusmiṃ ^b^na kuppati^eb^ na dussati na vikāraṃ āpajjati. ^b^yassevaṃ bhāvitaṃ citta^eb^nti yassa yathāvuttassa ariyapuggalassa ^a^P0.0248^ea^ cittaṃ evaṃ vuttanayena tādibhāvāvahanabhāvena bhāvitaṃ. ^b^kuto taṃ dukkhamessatī^eb^ti taṃ uttamapuggalaṃ kuto sattato saṅkhārato vā dukkhaṃ upagamissati, na tādisassa dukkhaṃ atthīti attho.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M0.0225^ea^ ^a^V0.0201^ea^ ^b^kosambiya^eb^nti kusumbena nāma isinā vasitaṭṭhāne māpitattā ``kosambī''ti evaṃladdhanāmake nagare. ^b^ghositārāme^eb^ti ghositaseṭṭhinā kārite ārāme. ^b^bhagavā ākiṇṇo viharatī^eb^ti bhagavā sambādhappatto viharati. kiṃ pana bhagavato sambādho atthi, saṃsaggo vāti? natthi. na hi koci bhagavantaṃ anicchāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti. durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto sabbattha ca anupalittattā. hitesitāya pana sattesu anukampaṃ upādāya ``mutto mocessāmī''ti paṭiññānurūpaṃ caturoghanittharaṇatthaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ parisānaṃ attano santikaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ adhivāseti, sayañca mahākaruṇāsamussāhito kālaññū hutvā tattha upasaṅkamati, idaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, ayamidha ākiṇṇavihāroti adhippeto.

[03] idha pana kosambikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalahajātānaṃ satthā dīghītissa kosalarañño vatthuṃ āharitvā, ``na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācana''ntiādinā (dha0 pa0 5; ma0 ni0 3.237; mahāva0 464) ovādaṃ adāsi, taṃ divasaṃ tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā. dutiyadivasepi bhagavā tameva vatthuṃ kathesi, taṃ divasampi tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā. tatiyadivasepi bhagavā tameva vatthuṃ kathesi, athaññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ evamāha -- ``appossukko, bhante bhagavā, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyutto viharatu, mayametena bhaṇḍanena kalahena viggahena vivādena ^a^P0.0249^ea^ paññāyissāmā''ti. satthā ``pariyādinnacittā kho ime moghapurisā na dānime sakkā saññāpetuṃ, natthi cettha saññāpetabbā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekacārikavāsaṃ vaseyyaṃ, evaṃ ime bhikkhū kalahato oramissantī''ti cintesi. evaṃ tehi kalahakārakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekavihāre vāsaṃ vinetabbābhāvato upāsakādīhi upasaṅkamanañca ākiṇṇavihāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ -- ``tena kho pana samayena bhagavā ākiṇṇo viharatī''tiādi.

[01] tattha ^b^dukkha^eb^nti na sukhaṃ, anārādhitacittatāya na iṭṭhanti attho. tenevāha ^b^``na phāsu viharāmī''^eb^ti. ^b^vūpakaṭṭho^eb^ti pavivekaṭṭho dūrībhūto. tathā cintetvāva bhagavā pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya ^a^M0.0226^ea^ caritvā kañci anāmantetvā eko adutiyo gantvā kosalaraṭṭhe pālileyyake vanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle vihāsi. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ...pe0... bhaddasālamūle''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^sāma^eb^nti sayaṃ. ^b^saṃsāmetvā^eb^ti paṭisāmetvā. ^b^pattacīvaramādāyā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0202^ea^ etthāpi sāmanti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^upaṭṭhāke^eb^ti kosambinagaravāsino ghositaseṭṭhiādike upaṭṭhāke, vihāre ca aggupaṭṭhākaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ anāmantetvā.

[03] evaṃ gate satthari pañcasatā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu -- ``āvuso ānanda, satthā ekakova gato, mayaṃ anubandhissāmā''ti. ``āvuso, yadā bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke ca anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ adutiyo gacchati, tadā ekacāraṃ carituṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayo, sāvakena nāma satthu ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ, tasmā na imesu divasesu bhagavā anugantabbo''ti nivāresi, sayampi nānugacchi.

[03] ^b^anupubbenā^eb^ti anukkamena, gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā cārikaṃ caramāno ``ekacāravāsaṃ tāva vasamānaṃ bhikkhuṃ passissāmī''ti bālakaloṇakāragāmaṃ gantvā tattha bhaguttherassa sakalaṃ pacchābhattañceva tiyāmañca rattiṃ ekacāravāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā punadivase tena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caritvā taṃ tattheva nivattetvā ``samaggavāsaṃ vasamāne tayo kulaputte passissāmī''ti ^a^P0.0250^ea^ pācīnavaṃsamigadāyaṃ gantvā tesampi sakalarattiṃ samaggavāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā tepi tattheva nivattetvā ekakova pālileyyagāmaṃ sampatto. pālileyyagāmavāsino paccuggantvā bhagavato dānaṃ datvā pālileyyagāmassa avidūre rakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma atthi, tattha bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā ``ettha bhagavā vasatū''ti yācitvā vāsayiṃsu. ^b^bhaddasālo^eb^ti pana tattheko manāpo bhaddako sālarukkho, bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālasamīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle vihāsi. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``pālileyyake viharati rakkhitavanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^hatthināgo^eb^ti mahāhatthī yūthapati. ^b^hatthikalabhehī^eb^ti hatthipotakehi. ^b^hatthicchāpehī^eb^ti khīrūpagehi daharahatthipotakehi, ye ``bhiṅkā''tipi ^a^M0.0227^ea^ vuccanti. ^b^chinnaggānī^eb^ti purato purato gacchantehi tehi hatthiādīhi chinnaggāni khāditāvasesāni khāṇusadisāni khādati. ^b^obhaggobhagga^eb^nti tena hatthināgena uccaṭṭhānato bhañjitvā bhañjitvā pātitaṃ. ^b^assa sākhābhaṅga^eb^nti etassa santakaṃ sākhābhaṅgaṃ te khādanti. ^b^āvilānī^eb^ti tehi paṭhamataraṃ otaritvā pivantehi āluḷitattā āvilāni kaddamamissāni pānīyāni pivati. ^b^ogāhā^eb^ti titthato. ``ogāha''ntipi pāḷi.^b^ assā^eb^ti hatthināgassa. ^b^upanighaṃsantiyo^eb^ti ghaṭṭentiyo, upanighaṃsiyamānopi ^a^V0.0203^ea^ attano uḷārabhāvena na kujjhati, tena tā taṃ ghaṃsantiyeva. ^b^yūthā^eb^ti hatthighaṭā.

[03] ^b^yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti so kira hatthināgo yūthavāse ukkaṇṭhito taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭho tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā ghaṭasahassena nibbāpitasantāpo viya nibbuto hutvā pasannacitto bhagavato santike aṭṭhāsi, tato paṭṭhāya vattasīse ṭhatvā bhaddasālassa paṇṇasālāya ca samantato appaharitakaṃ katvā sākhābhaṅgehi sammajjati, bhagavato mukhadhovanaṃ deti, nhānodakaṃ āharati, dantakaṭṭhaṃ deti, araññato madhurāni phalāni āharitvā satthu upaneti, satthā tāni paribhuñjati ^a^P0.0251^ea^. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``tatra sudaṃ so hatthināgo yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati, taṃ padesaṃ appaharitañca karoti, soṇḍāya bhagavato pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī''^eb^ti. soṇḍāya dārūni āharitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā dārūni jālāpetvā tattha pāsāṇakhaṇḍāni tāpetvā tāni daṇḍakehi pavaṭṭetvā soṇḍiyaṃ khipitvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavato santikaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhati, bhagavā ``hatthināgo mama nhānaṃ icchatī''ti tattha gantvā nhānakiccaṃ karoti, pānīyepi eseva nayo. tasmiṃ pana sītale sañjāte upasaṅkamati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``soṇḍāya bhagavato pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī''ti.

[03] ^b^atha kho bhagavato rahogatassā^eb^tiādi ubhinnaṃ mahānāgānaṃ vivekasukhapaccavekkhaṇadassanaṃ, taṃ vuttatthameva. ^b^attano ca pavivekaṃ viditvā^eb^ti kehici anākiṇṇabhāvaladdhaṃ kāyavivekaṃ jānitvā, itare pana vivekā bhagavato sabbakālaṃ vijjantiyeva.
[03] ^b^imaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0228^ea^ ^b^udāna^eb^nti imaṃ attano hatthināgassa ca pavivekābhiratiyā samānajjhāsayabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^etaṃ īsādantassa^eb^ rathaīsāsadisadantassa hatthināgassa ^b^cittaṃ nāgena^eb^ buddhanāgassa ^b^cittena sameti^eb^ saṃsandati. kathaṃ sameti ce? ^b^yadeko ramatī vane^eb^ yasmā buddhanāgo ``ahaṃ kho pubbe ākiṇṇo vihāsi''nti purimaṃ ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno idāni yathā ^b^eko^eb^ adutiyo ^b^vane^eb^ araññe ^b^ramati^eb^ abhiramati, evaṃ ayampi hatthināgo pubbe attano hatthiādīhi ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno idāni ^a^V0.0204^ea^ ^b^eko^eb^ asahāyo ^b^vane^eb^ araññe ^b^ramati^eb^ abhiramati. tasmāssa ^b^cittaṃ nāgena sameti^eb^ tassa cittena sametīti katvā ekībhāvaratiyā ekasadisaṃ hotīti attho.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^P0.0252^ea^ ^b^piṇḍolabhāradvājo^eb^ti piṇḍaṃ ulamāno pariyesamāno pabbajitoti piṇḍolo. so kira parijiṇṇabhogo brāhmaṇo hutvā mahantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā piṇḍatthāya nikkhamitvā pabbajito. so mahantaṃ kapallaṃ ``patta''nti gahetvā carati, kapallapūraṃ yāguṃ pivati, bhattaṃ bhuñjati, pūvakhajjakañca khādati. athassa mahagghasabhāvaṃ satthu ārocesuṃ. satthā tassa pattatthavikaṃ nānujāni, heṭṭhāmañce pattaṃ nikkujjitvā ṭhapeti, so ṭhapentopi ghaṃsentova paṇāmetvā ṭhapeti, gaṇhantopi ghaṃsentova ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhāti. taṃ gacchante gacchante kāle ghaṃsanena parikkhīṇaṃ, nāḷikodanamattasseva gaṇhanakaṃ jātaṃ. tato satthu ārocesuṃ, athassa satthā pattatthavikaṃ anujāni. thero aparena samayena indriyabhāvanaṃ bhāvento aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. iti so pubbe savisesaṃ piṇḍatthāya ulatīti piṇḍolo, gottena pana bhāradvājoti ubhayaṃ ekato katvā ``piṇḍolabhāradvājo''ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^āraññako^eb^ti ^a^M0.0229^ea^ gāmantasenāsanapaṭikkhipanena araññe nivāso assāti āraññako, āraññakadhutaṅgaṃ samādāya vattantassetaṃ nāmaṃ. tathā bhikkhāsaṅkhātānaṃ āmisapiṇḍānaṃ pāto piṇḍapāto, parehi dinnānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte nipatananti attho. piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati taṃ taṃ kulaṃ upasaṅkamanto gavesatīti ^b^piṇḍapātiko,^eb^ piṇḍāya vā patituṃ carituṃ vatametassāti piṇḍapātī, piṇḍapātīyeva piṇḍapātiko. saṅkārakūṭādīsu paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena paṃsukūlaṃ viyāti paṃsukūlaṃ, paṃsu viya vā kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlaṃ, paṃsukūlassa dhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ sīlaṃ etassāti ^b^paṃsukūliko^eb^. saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgāntaravāsakasaṅkhātāni tīṇi cīvarāni ticīvaraṃ, ticīvarassa dhāraṇaṃ ticīvaraṃ, taṃ sīlaṃ etassāti ^b^tecīvariko. appiccho^eb^tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^dhutavādo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0205^ea^ ^a^P0.0253^ea^ ^b^dhuto^eb^ vuccati dhutakileso puggalo, kilesadhunanakadhammo vā. tattha atthi dhuto, na dhutavādo, atthi na dhuto, dhutavādo, atthi neva dhuto, na dhutavādo, atthi dhuto ceva, dhutavādo cāti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. tesu yo sayaṃ dhutadhamme samādāya vattati, na paraṃ tadatthāya samādapeti, ayaṃ paṭhamo. yo pana sayaṃ na dhutadhamme samādāya vattati, paraṃ samādapeti, ayaṃ dutiyo. yo ubhayarahito, ayaṃ tatiyo. yo pana ubhayasampanno, ayaṃ catuttho. evarūpo ca āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājoti. tena vuttaṃ ``dhutavādo''ti. ekadesasarūpekasesavasena hi ayaṃ niddeso yathā taṃ ``nāmarūpa''nti.

[03] ^b^adhicittamanuyutto^eb^ti ettha aṭṭhasamāpattisampayogato arahattaphalasamāpattisampayogato vā cittassa adhicittabhāvo veditabbo, idha pana ``arahattaphalacitta''nti vadanti. taṃtaṃsamāpattīsu samādhi eva adhicittaṃ, idha pana arahattaphalasamādhi veditabbo. keci pana ``adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kālena kālaṃ tīṇi nimittāni manasi kātabbānīti etasmiṃ adhicittasutte (a0 ni0 3.103) viya samathavipassanācittaṃ adhicittanti idhādhippeta''nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. purimoyevattho gahetabbo.

[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0230^ea^ ^b^viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa adhiṭṭhānaparikkhārasampadāsampannaṃ adhicittānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. evaṃ ``adhicittānuyogo mama sāsanānuṭṭhāna''nti dīpento ^b^imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^anūpavādo^eb^ti vācāya kassacipi anupavadanaṃ. ^b^anūpaghāto^eb^ti kāyena kassaci upaghātākaraṇaṃ. ^b^pātimokkhe^eb^ti ettha pātimokkhapadassa attho heṭṭhā nānappakārehi vutto, tasmiṃ pātimokkhe. sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇo ^b^saṃvaro. mattaññutā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0254^ea^ paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena pamāṇaññutā. ^b^pantañca sayanāsana^eb^nti vivittaṃ saṅghaṭṭanavirahitaṃ senāsanaṃ. ^b^adhicitte ca āyogo^eb^ti aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhigamāya bhāvanānuyogo.

[03] aparo nayo -- ^b^anūpavādo^eb^ti kassacipi uparujjhanavacanassa avadanaṃ. tena sabbampi vācasikaṃ sīlaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^anūpaghāto^eb^ti kāyena kassaci upaghātassa paraviheṭhanassa akaraṇaṃ. tena sabbampi kāyikaṃ sīlaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. yādisaṃ panidaṃ ubhayaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanantogadhaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ -- ^b^``pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^ca^eb^saddo nipātamattaṃ. ^b^pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro^eb^ti pātimokkhasaṃvarabhūto anūpavādo anūpaghāto cāti attho.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0206^ea^ vā ^b^pātimokkhe^eb^ti adhikaraṇe bhummaṃ. pātimokkhe nissayabhūte saṃvaro. ko pana soti? anūpavādo anūpaghāto. upasampadavelāyañhi avisesena pātimokkhasīlaṃ samādinnaṃ nāma hoti, tasmiṃ pātimokkhe ṭhitassa tato paraṃ upavādūpaghātānaṃ akaraṇavasena saṃvaro, so anūpavādo anūpaghāto cāti vutto.

[03] atha vā ^b^pātimokkhe^eb^ti nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ yathā ``cetaso avūpasamo ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna''nti (saṃ0 ni0 5.232). tena pātimokkhena sādhetabbo anūpavādo anūpaghāto, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṅgahito anūpavādo anūpaghātoicceva attho. ^b^saṃvaro^eb^ti iminā pana satisaṃvaro ^a^M0.0231^ea^, ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti imesaṃ catunnaṃ saṃvarānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, pātimokkhasādhanaṃ idaṃ saṃvaracatukkaṃ.

[03] ^b^mattaññutā ca bhattasmi^eb^nti pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogavissajjanānaṃ vasena bhojane pamāṇaññutā. ^b^pantañca sayanāsana^eb^nti bhāvanānukūlaṃ araññarukkhamūlādivivittasenāsanaṃ. ^b^adhicitte ca āyogo^eb^ti sabbacittānaṃ adhikattā uttamattā adhicittasaṅkhāte arahattaphalacitte sādhetabbe tassa nipphādanatthaṃ samathavipassanābhāvanāvasena āyogo. ^b^etaṃ buddhāna sāsana^eb^nti etaṃ parassa anūpavadanaṃ, anūpaghātanaṃ, pātimokkhasaṃvaro ^a^P0.0255^ea^, pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇādīsu mattaññutā, vivittavāso, yathāvuttādhicittānuyogo ca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti attho. evaṃ imāya gāthāya tisso sikkhā kathitāti veditabbā.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sattame apubbaṃ natthi. gāthāya ^b^adhicetaso^eb^ti adhicittavato, sabbacittānaṃ adhikena arahattaphalacittena samannāgatassāti attho. ^b^appamajjato^eb^ti na pamajjato, appamādena anavajjadhammesu sātaccakiriyāya samannāgatassāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^munino^eb^ti ``yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī''ti (dha0 pa0 269; cūḷani0 mettagūmāṇavapucchāniddesa 21) evaṃ ubhayalokamunanena monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena arahattaphalañāṇasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgatattā ^a^V0.0207^ea^ vā khīṇāsavo muni nāma, tassa munino. ^b^monapathesu sikkhato^eb^ti arahattañāṇasaṅkhātassa monassa pathesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesu tīsu vā sikkhāsu sikkhato. idañca pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. pariniṭṭhitasikkho hi arahā, tasmā evaṃ sikkhato, imāya sikkhāya munibhāvaṃ pattassa muninoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. yasmā ca etadeva, tasmā heṭṭhimamaggaphalacittānaṃ vasena adhicetaso, catusaccasambodhapaṭipattiyaṃ appamādavasena appamajjato, maggañāṇasamannāgamena muninoti evametesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ attho yujjatiyeva. atha vā ``appamajjato sikkhato''ti ^a^M0.0232^ea^ padānaṃ hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu ca adhicetasoti.

[03] ^b^sokā na bhavanti tādino^eb^ti tādisassa khīṇāsavamunino abbhantare iṭṭhaviyogādivatthukā sokā cittasantāpā na honti. atha vā ^b^tādino^eb^ti tādilakkhaṇasamannāgatassa evarūpassa munino sokā na bhavantīti ^a^P0.0256^ea^ ayamettha attho. ^b^upasantassā^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ accantūpasamena upasantassa. ^b^sadā satīmato^eb^ti sativepullappattiyā niccakālaṃ satiyā avirahitassa.

[03] ettha ca ``adhicetaso''ti iminā adhicittasikkhā, ``appamajjato''ti etena adhisīlasikkhā, ``munino monapathesu sikkhato''ti etehi adhipaññāsikkhā. ``munino''ti vā etena adhipaññāsikkhā, ``monapathesu sikkhato''ti etena tāsaṃ lokuttarasikkhānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadā, ``sokā na bhavantī''tiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃso pakāsitoti veditabbaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] sattamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 38^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^sakkato^eb^tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vaṇṇitoyeva. ^b^asahamānā^eb^ti na sahamānā, usūyantāti attho. bhikkhusaṅghassa ca sakkāraṃ asahamānāti sambandho.

[03] ^b^sundarī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0208^ea^ tassā nāmaṃ. sā kira tasmiṃ kāle sabbaparibbājikāsu abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā, teneva sā ``sundarī''ti paññāyittha. sā ca anatītayobbanā asaṃyatasamācārāva hoti, tasmā te sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ pāpakamme uyyojesuṃ. te hi aññatitthiyā buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya sayaṃ hatalābhasakkārā heṭṭhā akkosasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgatanayena bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uḷāraṃ aparimitaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattamānaṃ disvā issāpakatā ekato hutvā sammantayiṃsu -- mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya naṭṭhā hatalābhasakkārā, na no koci ^a^M0.0233^ea^ atthibhāvampi jānāti, kiṃ nissāya nu kho loko samaṇe gotame abhippasanno uḷāraṃ sakkārasammānaṃ upanetīti? tattheko āha -- ``uccākulappasuto asambhinnāya mahāsammatappaveṇiyā jāto''ti, aparo ``abhijātiyaṃ tassa anekāni ^a^P0.0257^ea^ acchariyāni pātubhūtānī''ti, añño ``kāladevilaṃ vandāpetuṃ upanītassa pādā parivattitvā tassa jaṭāsu patiṭṭhitā''ti, aparo ``vappamaṅgalakāle jambucchāyāya sayāpitassa vītikkantepi majjhanhike jambucchāyā aparivattitvā ṭhitā''ti, añño ``abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko rūpasampattiyā''ti, aparo ``jiṇṇāturamatapabbajitasaṅkhātanimitte disvā saṃvegajāto āgāminaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito''ti. evaṃ aparimāṇakāle sambhataṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato puññañāṇasambhāraṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ nirupamaṃ sallekhappaṭipadaṃ anuttarañca ñāṇapahānasampadādibuddhānubhāvaṃ ajānantā attanā yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ dharamānaṃ taṃ taṃ bhagavato bahumānakāraṇaṃ kittetvā abahumānakāraṇaṃ pariyesitvā apassantā ``kena nu kho kāraṇena mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa ayasaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāseyyāmā''ti. tesu eko tikhiṇamantī evamāha -- ``ambho imasmiṃ sattaloke mātugāmasukhe asattasattā nāma natthi, ayañca samaṇo gotamo abhirūpo devasamo taruṇo, attano samarūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ labhitvā sajjeyya. athāpi na sajjeyya, janassa pana saṅkiyo bhaveyya, handa mayaṃ sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ tathā uyyojema, yathā samaṇassa gotamassa ayaso pathaviyaṃ patthareyyā''ti.

[03] taṃ sutvā itare ``idaṃ suṭṭhu tayā cintitaṃ, evañhi kate samaṇo gotamo ayasakena upadduto sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkonto yena vā tena vā palāyissatī''ti sabbeva ekajjhāsayā hutvā tathā uyyojetuṃ sundariyā santikaṃ agamaṃsu. sā te disvā ``kiṃ tumhe ekato āgatatthā''ti āha. titthiyā anālapantā ārāmapariyante paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīdiṃsu. sā tattha gantvā punappunaṃ ālapantī paṭivacanaṃ alabhitvā kiṃ tumhākaṃ aparajjhaṃ? kasmā me paṭivacanaṃ na dethāti? tathā hi pana tvaṃ amhe ^a^P0.0258^ea^ viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasīti ^a^V0.0209^ea^. ko ^a^M0.0234^ea^ tumhe viheṭhetīti? ``kiṃ pana tvaṃ na passasi, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhetvā hatalābhasakkāre katvā vicaranta''nti vatvā ``tattha mayā kiṃ kātabba''nti vutte ``tena hi tvaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanasamīpaṃ gantvā mahājanassa evañcevañca vadeyyāsī''ti āhaṃsu. sāpi ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchi. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``aññatitthiyā paribbājakā bhagavato^eb^ ^b^sakkāraṃ asahamānā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^ussahasī^eb^ti sakkosi. ^b^attha^eb^nti hitaṃ kiccaṃ vā. ^b^kyāha^eb^nti kiṃ ahaṃ. yasmā te titthiyā tassā aññātakāpi samānā pabbajjasambandhamattena saṅgaṇhituṃ ñātakā viya hutvā ^b^``ussahasi tvaṃ bhagini ñātīnaṃ atthaṃ kātu''^eb^nti āhaṃsu. tasmā sāpi migaṃ valli viya pāde laggā ^b^jīvitampi me pariccattaṃ ñātīnaṃ atthāyā^eb^ti āha.

[03] ^b^tena hī^eb^ti ``yasmā tvaṃ `jīvitampi me tumhākaṃ atthāya pariccatta'nti vadasi, tvañca paṭhamavaye ṭhitā abhirūpā sobhaggappattā ca, tasmā yathā taṃ nissāya samaṇassa gotamassa ayaso uppajjissati, tathā kareyyāsī''ti vatvā ``abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ gacchāhī''ti uyyojesuṃ. sāpi kho bālā kakacadantapantiyā pupphāvalikīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmā viya, pabhinnamadaṃ caṇḍahatthiṃ soṇḍāya parāmasantī viya, nalāṭena maccuṃ gaṇhantī viya titthiyānaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mālāgandhavilepanatambūlamukhavāsādīni gahetvā mahājanassa satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nagaraṃ pavisanakāle jetavanābhimukhī gacchantī ``kahaṃ gacchasī''ti ca puṭṭhā ``samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ, ahañhi tena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasāmī''ti vatvā aññatarasmiṃ titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova jetavanamaggaṃ otaritvā nagarābhimukhī āgacchantī ^a^P0.0259^ea^ ``kiṃ sundari kahaṃ gatāsī''ti ca puṭṭhā ``samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā taṃ kilesaratiyā ramāpetvā āgatāmhī''ti vadati. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``evaṃ ayyāti kho sundarī paribbājikā tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ paṭissutvā abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsī''^eb^ti.

[03] titthiyā katipāhassa accayena dhuttānaṃ kahāpaṇe datvā ``gacchatha, sundariṃ māretvā samaṇassa gotamassa gandhakuṭiyā avidūre mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā ethā''ti vadiṃsu. te tathā akaṃsu. tato titthiyā ``sundariṃ na passāmā''ti kolāhalaṃ katvā rañño ārocetvā ^a^M0.0235^ea^ ``kattha pana tumhe parisaṅkathā''ti raññā vuttā imesu divasesu jetavane vasati, tatthassā pavattiṃ na jānāmāti. ``tena hi gacchatha, naṃ tattha vicinathā''ti raññā anuññātā attano upaṭṭhāke gahetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā vicinantā viya hutvā mālākacavaraṃ byūhitvā tassā ^a^V0.0210^ea^ sarīraṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā ``samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā `satthunā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ paṭicchādessāmā'ti sundariṃ māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipiṃsū''ti rañño ārocesuṃ. rājāpi anupaparikkhitvā ``tena hi gacchatha, nagaraṃ āhiṇḍathā''ti āha. te nagaravīthīsu ``passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma''ntiādīni vadantā vicaritvā puna rañño nivesanadvāraṃ agamaṃsu. rājā sundariyā sarīraṃ āmakasusāne aṭṭakaṃ āropetvā rakkhāpesi. sāvatthivāsino ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake yebhuyyena ``passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma''ntiādīni vatvā antonagare bahinagare ca bhikkhū akkosantā vicariṃsu. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``yadā te aññiṃsu titthiyā paribbājakā `vodiṭṭhā kho sundarī'''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^aññiṃsū^eb^ti jāniṃsu. ^b^vodiṭṭhā^eb^ti byapadiṭṭhā, jetavanaṃ āgacchantī ca gacchantī ca visesato diṭṭhā, bahulaṃ diṭṭhāti attho. ^b^parikhākūpe^eb^ti dīghikāvāṭe ^a^P0.0260^ea^. ^b^yā sā, mahārāja, sundarī^eb^ti, mahārāja, yā sā imasmiṃ nagare rūpasundaratāya ``sundarī''ti pākaṭā abhiññātā paribbājikā. ^b^sā no na dissatī^eb^ti sā amhākaṃ cakkhu viya jīvitaṃ viya ca piyāyitabbā, idāni na dissati. ^b^yathānikkhitta^eb^nti purise āṇāpetvā mālākacavarantare attanā yathāṭhapitaṃ. ``yathānikhāta''ntipi pāṭho, pathaviyaṃ nikhātappakāranti attho.

[03] ^b^rathiyāya rathiya^eb^nti vīthito vīthiṃ. ^b^vīthī^eb^ti hi vinivijjhanakaracchā. ^b^siṅghāṭaka^eb^nti tikoṇaracchā. ^b^alajjino^eb^ti na lajjino, pāpajigucchāvirahitāti attho. ^b^dussīlā^eb^ti nissīlā. ^b^pāpadhammā^eb^ti lāmakasabhāvā nihīnācārā. ^b^musāvādino^eb^ti dussīlā samānā ``sīlavanto maya''nti alikavāditāya musāvādino. ^b^abrahmacārino^eb^ti ``methunappaṭisevitāya aseṭṭhacārino ime hi nāmā''ti hīḷentā vadanti. ^b^dhammacārino^eb^ti kusaladhammacārino. ^b^samacārino^eb^ti kāyakammādisamacārino. ^b^kalyāṇadhammā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0236^ea^ sundarasabhāvā, paṭijānissanti nāmāti sambandho. nāmasaddayogena hi ettha paṭijānissantīti anāgatakālavacanaṃ. ^b^sāmañña^eb^nti samaṇabhāvo samitapāpatā. ^b^brahmañña^eb^nti seṭṭhabhāvo bāhitapāpatā. ^b^kuto^eb^ti kena kāraṇena. ^b^apagatā^eb^ti apetā paribhaṭṭhā. ^b^purisakicca^eb^nti methunappaṭisevanaṃ sandhāya vadanti.

[03] atha bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ. satthā ``tena hi, bhikkhave, tumhepi te manusse imāya gāthāya paṭicodethā''ti vatvā ``abhūtavādī''ti gāthamāha. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ^b^``atha kho sambahulā...pe0... nihīnakammā manujā paratthā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^neso, bhikkhave, saddo ciraṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0211^ea^ ^b^bhavissatī^eb^ti idaṃ satthā tassa ayasassa nipphattiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā bhikkhū samassāsento āha.

[03] gāthāyaṃ ^b^abhūtavādī^eb^ti parassa dosaṃ adisvāva musāvādaṃ katvā abhūtena atacchena paraṃ abbhācikkhanto. ^b^yo vāpi katvā^eb^ti yo vā pana pāpakammaṃ katvā ``nāhaṃ etaṃ karomī''ti āha. ^b^pecca samā bhavantī^eb^ti te ubhopi janā ito paralokaṃ gantvā ^a^P0.0261^ea^ nirayūpagamanena gatiyā samā bhavanti. gatiyeva hi nesaṃ paricchinnā, āyū pana aparicchinnā. bahukañhi pāpaṃ katvā ciraṃ niraye paccati, parittakaṃ katvā appamattakameva kālaṃ paccati. yasmā pana nesaṃ ubhinnampi lāmakameva kammaṃ, tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^nihīnakammā manujā paratthā^eb^ti. ``paratthā''ti imassa pana padassa purato ``peccā''tipadena sambandho, pecca parattha ito gantvā te nihīnakammā paraloke samā bhavantīti attho.

[03] ^b^pariyāpuṇitvā^eb^ti uggahetvā. ^b^akārakā^eb^ti aparādhassa na kārakā. ^b^nayimehi kata^eb^nti evaṃ kira nesamahosi -- imehi samaṇehi sakyaputtiyehi addhā taṃ pāpakammaṃ na kataṃ, yaṃ aññatitthiyā ugghositvā sakalanagaraṃ āhiṇḍiṃsu, yasmā ime amhesu evaṃ asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi abbhācikkhantesupi na kiñci vikāraṃ dassenti, khantisoraccañca na vijahanti, kevalaṃ pana ``abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upetī''ti dhammaṃyeva vadantā sapantiyeva, ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā amhe anupadhāretvā abbhācikkhante sapanti, sapathaṃ karontā viya vadanti ^a^M0.0237^ea^. atha vā ``yo vāpi katvā `na karomi' cāhā''ti vadantā sapanti, attano akārakabhāvaṃ bodhetuṃ amhākaṃ sapathaṃ karonti imeti attho.

[03] tesañhi manussānaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitagāthāya savanasamanantarameva buddhānubhāvena sārajjaṃ okkami, saṃvego uppajji ``nayidaṃ amhehi paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ nāma tathāpi hoti, aññathāpi hoti, ete ca aññatitthiyā imesaṃ anatthakāmā ahitakāmā, tasmā te saddhāya nayidaṃ amhehi vattabbaṃ, dujjānā hi samaṇā''ti. te tato paṭṭhāya tato oramiṃsu.

[03] rājāpi yehi sundarī māritā, tesaṃ jānanatthaṃ purise āṇāpesi. atha te dhuttā tehi kahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivantā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ kariṃsu. tesu hi eko ekaṃ āha -- ``tvaṃ sundariṃ ekappahārena māretvā mālākacavarantare khipitvā tato laddhakahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivasi, hotu hotū''ti. rājapurisā taṃ sutvā te dhutte gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. rājā ^a^P0.0262^ea^ ``tumhehi sā ^a^V0.0212^ea^ māritā''ti te dhutte pucchi. ``āma, devā''ti. ``kehi mārāpitā''ti? ``aññatitthiyehi, devā''ti. rājā titthiye pakkosāpetvā tamatthaṃ paṭijānāpetvā, ``ayaṃ sundarī tassa samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ āropetukāmehi amhehi mārāpitā, neva gotamassa, na gotamasāvakānaṃ doso atthi, amhākameva dosoti evaṃ vadantā nagaraṃ āhiṇḍathā''ti āṇāpesi. te tathā akaṃsu. mahājano sammadeva saddahi. titthiyānaṃ dhikkāraṃ akāsi, titthiyā manussavadhadaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. tato paṭṭhāya buddhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhiyyosomattāya sakkārasammāno mahā ahosi. bhikkhū acchariyabbhutacittajātā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā attamanā paṭivedesuṃ. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū...pe0... antarahito so, bhante, saddo''^eb^ti.

[03] kasmā pana bhagavā ``titthiyānaṃ idaṃ kamma''nti bhikkhūnaṃ nārocesi? ariyānaṃ tāva ārocanena payojanaṃ natthi, puthujjanesu pana ``ye na saddaheyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyyā''ti nārocesi. apicetaṃ buddhānaṃ anāciṇṇaṃ, yaṃ anāgatassa īdisassa vatthussa ācikkhanaṃ. parānuddesikameva hi bhagavā saṃkilesapakkhaṃ vibhāveti ^a^M0.0238^ea^, kammañca katokāsaṃ na sakkā nivattetunti abbhakkhānaṃ tannimittañca bhagavā ajjhupekkhanto nisīdi. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe,
[27] na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa.
[26] na vijjatī so jagatippadeso,
[22] yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammā''ti.. (dha0 pa0 127; mi0 pa0 4.2.4).

[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ viditvā^eb^ti mammacchedanavasenāpi bālajanehi pavattitaṃ duruttavacanaṃ khantibalasamannāgatassa dhīrassa duttitikkhā nāma natthīti imamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. ^b^imaṃ udāna^eb^nti imaṃ adhivāsanakhantibalavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] tattha ^b^tudanti vācāya janā asaññatā, sarehi saṅgāmagataṃva^eb^ ^a^P0.0263^ea^ ^b^kuñjara^eb^nti kāyikasaṃvarādīsu kassacipi saṃvarassa abhāvena asaṃyatā avinītā bālajanā sarehi sāyakehi saṅgāmagataṃ yuddhagataṃ kuñjaraṃva hatthināgaṃ paṭiyodhā viya vācāsattīhi tudanti vijjhanti, ayaṃ tesaṃ sabhāvo ^a^V0.0213^ea^. ^b^sutvāna vākyaṃ pharusaṃ udīritaṃ, adhivāsaye bhikkhu aduṭṭhacitto^eb^ti taṃ pana tehi bālajanehi udīritaṃ bhāsitaṃ mammaghaṭṭanavasena pavattitaṃ pharusaṃ vākyaṃ vacanaṃ abhūtaṃ bhūtato nibbeṭhento mama kakacūpamaovādaṃ (ma0 ni0 1.222 ādayo) anussaranto īsakampi aduṭṭhacitto hutvā ``saṃsārasabhāvo eso''ti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhaṇasīlo bhikkhu adhivāsaye, adhivāsanakhantiyaṃ ṭhatvā khameyyāti attho.

[03] etthāha -- kiṃ pana taṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ aparimāṇakālaṃ sakkaccaṃ upacitavipulapuññasambhāro satthā evaṃ dāruṇaṃ abhūtabbhakkhānaṃ pāpuṇīti? vuccate -- ayaṃ so bhagavā bodhisattabhūto atītajātiyaṃ munāḷi nāma dhutto hutvā pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo vicarati. so ekadivasaṃ surabhiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ passi. tasmiñca samaye aññatarā itthī tassa avidūrena gacchati. dhutto ``abrahmacārī ayaṃ samaṇo''ti abbhācikkhi. so tena kammena bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena idāni buddho hutvāpi sundariyā kāraṇā abhūtabbhakkhānaṃ ^a^M0.0239^ea^ pāpuṇi. yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ ciñcamāṇavikādīnaṃ vikārakitthīnaṃ bhagavato abbhakkhānādīni dukkhāni pattāni, sabbāni pubbe katassa kammassa vipākāvasesāni, yāni ``kammapilotikānī''ti vuccanti. vuttañhetaṃ apadāne (apa0 thera 1.39.64-96) --
[21] ``anotattasarāsanne, ramaṇīye silātale.
[22] nānāratanapajjote, nānāgandhavanantare..
[21] ``mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena, pareto lokanāyako.
[22] āsīno byākarī tattha, pubbakammāni attano..
[21] ``suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā.
[22] pilotikassa kammassa, buddhattepi vipaccati..
[21] ``munāḷi ^a^P0.0264^ea^ nāmahaṃ dhutto, pubbe aññāsu jātisu.
[22] paccekabuddhaṃ surabhiṃ, abbhācikkhiṃ adūsakaṃ..
[21] ``tena ^a^V0.0214^ea^ kammavipākena, niraye saṃsariṃ ciraṃ.
[22] bahū vassasahassāni, dukkhaṃ vedemi vedanaṃ..
[21] ``tena kammāvasesena, idha pacchimake bhave.
[22] abbhakkhānaṃ mayā laddhaṃ, sundarikāya kāraṇā..
[21] ``sabbābhibhussa buddhassa, nando nāmāsi sāvako.
[22] taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā..
[21] ``dasa vassasahassāni, niraye saṃsariṃ ciraṃ.
[22] manussabhāvaṃ laddhāhaṃ, abbhakkhānaṃ bahuṃ labhiṃ..
[21] ``tena kammāvasesena, ciñcamāṇavikā mamaṃ.
[22] abbhācikkhi abhūtena, janakāyassa aggato..
[21] ``brāhmaṇo sutavā āsiṃ, ahaṃ sakkatapūjito.
[22] mahāvane pañcasate, mante vācemi māṇave..
[21] ``tatthāgato ^a^M0.0240^ea^ isī bhīmo, pañcābhiñño mahiddhiko.
[22] tañcāhaṃ āgataṃ disvā, abbhācikkhiṃ adūsakaṃ..
[21] ``tatohaṃ avacaṃ sisse, kāmabhogī ayaṃ isi.
[22] mayhampi bhāsamānassa, anumodiṃsu māṇavā..
[21] ``tato māṇavakā sabbe, bhikkhamānaṃ kule kule.
[22] mahājanassa āhaṃsu, kāmabhogī ayaṃ isi..
[21] ``tena kammavipākena, pañca bhikkhusatā ime.
[22] abbhakkhānaṃ labhuṃ sabbe, sundarikāya kāraṇā..
[21] ``vemātubhātikaṃ pubbe, dhanahetu haniṃ ahaṃ.
[22] pakkhipiṃgiriduggasmiṃ, silāya ca apiṃsayiṃ..
[21] ``tena ^a^V0.0215^ea^ kammavipākena, devadatto silaṃ khipi.
[22] aṅguṭṭhaṃ piṃsayī pāde, mama pāsāṇasakkharā..
[21] ``purehaṃ dārako hutvā, kīḷamāno mahāpathe.
[22] paccekabuddhaṃ disvāna, magge sakalikaṃ khipiṃ..
[21] ``tena ^a^P0.0265^ea^ kammavipākena, idha pacchimake bhave.
[22] vadhatthaṃ maṃ devadatto, abhimāre payojayi..
[21] ``hatthāroho pure āsiṃ, paccekamunimuttamaṃ.
[22] piṇḍāya vicarantaṃ taṃ, āsādesiṃ gajenahaṃ..
[21] ``tena kammavipākena, bhanto nāḷāgirī gajo.
[22] giribbaje puravare, dāruṇo samupāgami..
[21] ``rājāhaṃ patthivo āsiṃ, sattiyā purise haniṃ.
[22] tena kammavipākena, niraye paccisaṃ bhusaṃ..
[21] ``kammuno tassa sesena, sodāni sakalaṃ mama.
[22] pāde chaviṃ pakappesi, na hi kammaṃ vinassati..
[21] ``ahaṃ ^a^M0.0241^ea^ kevaṭṭagāmasmiṃ, ahuṃ kevaṭṭadārako.
[22] macchake ghātite disvā, janayiṃ somanassakaṃ..
[21] ``tena kammavipākena, sīsadukkhaṃ ahū mama.
[22] sakkā ca sabbe haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho..
[21] ``phussassāhaṃ pāvacane, sāvake paribhāsayiṃ.
[22] yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo..
[21] ``tena ^a^V0.0216^ea^ kammavipākena, temāsaṃ khāditaṃ yavaṃ.
[22] nimantito brāhmaṇena, verañjāyaṃ vasiṃ tadā..
[21] ``nibbuddhe vattamānamhi, mallaputtaṃ niheṭhayiṃ.
[22] tena kammavipākena, piṭṭhidukkhaṃ ahū mama..
[21] ``tikicchako ahaṃ āsiṃ, seṭṭhiputtaṃ virecayiṃ.
[22] tena kammavipākena, hoti pakkhandikā mama..
[21] ``avacāhaṃ jotipālo, kassapaṃ sugataṃ tadā.
[22] kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā..
[21] ``tena kammavipākena, acariṃ dukkaraṃ bahuṃ.
[22] chabbassānuruvelāyaṃ, tato bodhiṃ apāpuṇiṃ..
[21] ``nāhaṃ ^a^P0.0266^ea^ etena maggena, pāpuṇiṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
[22] kummaggena gavesissaṃ, pubbakammena vārito..
[21] ``puññapāpaparikkhīṇo, sabbasantāpavajjito.
[22] asoko anupāyāso, nibbāyissamanāsavo..
[21] ``evaṃ jino viyākāsi, bhikkhusaṅghassa aggato.
[22] sabbābhiññābalappatto, anotattamahāsare''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.64-96).
[06] aṭṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V0.0217^ea^ ^a^M0.0242^ea^ ^b^upasenassā^eb^ti ettha ^b^upaseno^eb^ti tassa therassa nāmaṃ, vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa pana puttattā ``vaṅgantaputto''ti ca naṃ voharanti.

[03] ayañhi thero āyasmato sāriputtassa kaniṭṭhabhātā, sāsane pabbajitvā apaññatte sikkhāpade upasampadāya dvivasso upajjhāyo hutvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gato, tassa bhikkhuno bhagavatā tassa saddhivihārikabhāvaṃ pucchitvā khandhake āgatanayena ``atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ, moghapurisa, āvatto bāhullāya, yadidaṃ gaṇabandhiya''nti (mahāva0 75) vigarahito patodābhitunno viya ājānīyo saṃviggamānaso ``yadipāhaṃ idāni parisaṃ nissāya bhagavatā vigarahito, parisaṃyeva pana nissāya pāsaṃsiyo bhaveyya''nti ussāhajāto sabbe dhutadhamme samādāya vattamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā na cirasseva chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāppatto mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā attano nissitake dhutaṅgadhare eva katvā tehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā santhatasikkhāpade (pārā0 565 ādayo) āgatanayena ``pāsādikā kho tyāyaṃ, upasena, parisā''ti parisavasena bhagavato santikā laddhapasaṃso ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ yadidaṃ upaseno ^a^P0.0267^ea^ vaṅgantaputto''ti (a0 ni0 1.213) etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā mahāsāvakesu abbhantaro.

[03] so ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto antevāsikesu attano attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gatesu udakakumbhato udakaṃ gahetvā pāde pakkhāletvā gattāni sītiṃ katvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ attharitvā divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno attano guṇe āvajjesi. tassa te anekasatā anekasahassā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu. so ``mayhaṃ tāva sāvakassa sato ime evarūpā guṇā, kīdisā nu kho mayhaṃ satthu guṇā''ti bhagavato guṇābhimukhaṃ manasikāraṃ pesesi. te tassa ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ anekakoṭisahassā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. so ``evaṃsīlo me satthā evaṃdhammo evaṃpañño evaṃvimuttī''tiādinā ca ``itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho''tiādinā ca āvibhāvānurūpaṃ satthu guṇe anussaritvā ^a^M0.0243^ea^, tato ``svākkhāto''tiādinā dhammassa, ``suppaṭipanno''tiādinā ariyasaṅghassa ca guṇe anussari. evaṃ mahāthero anekākāravokāraṃ ratanattayaguṇesu āvibhūtesu attamano pamudito uḷārapītisomanassaṃ ^a^V0.0218^ea^ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi. tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``āyasmato upasenassa vaṅgantaputtassa rahogatassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^rahogatassā^eb^ti rahasi gatassa. ^b^paṭisallīnassā^eb^ti ekībhūtassa. ^b^evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī^eb^ti evaṃ idāni vuccamānākāro cittassa vitakko uppajji. ^b^lābhā vata me^eb^ti ye ime manussattabuddhuppādasaddhāsamadhigamādayo, aho vata me ete lābhā. ^b^suladdhaṃ vata me^eb^ti yañcidaṃ mayā bhagavato sāsane pabbajjūpasampadāratanattayapayirupāsanādi paṭiladdhaṃ, taṃ me aho vata suṭṭhu laddhaṃ. tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``satthā ca me''^eb^tiādinā.

[03] tattha diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ satte anusāsatīti ^b^satthā^eb^. bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi ^b^bhagavā^eb^. ārakattā kilesehi, kilesārīnaṃ hatattā, saṃsāracakkassa vā arānaṃ hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā ^b^arahaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0268^ea^. sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā ^b^sammāsambuddho^eb^ti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.123 ādayo) buddhānussatiniddesato gahetabbo.

[03] ^b^svākkhāte^eb^ti suṭṭhu akkhāte, ekantaniyyānikaṃ katvā bhāsite. ^b^dhammavinaye^eb^ti pāvacane. tañhi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānānaṃ saṃsāradukkhapātato dhāraṇena, rāgādikilese vinayanena ca dhammavinayoti vuccati. ^b^sabrahmacārino^eb^ti seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmasaṅkhātaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ ariyamaggaṃ saha caranti paṭipajjantīti sabrahmacārino. ^b^sīlavanto^eb^ti maggaphalasīlavasena sīlavanto. ^b^kalyāṇadhammā^eb^ti samādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanādayo kalyāṇā sundarā dhammā etesaṃ atthīti kalyāṇadhammā. etena saṅghassa suppaṭipattiṃ dasseti. ^b^sīlesu camhi paripūrakārī^eb^ti ``ahampi pabbajitvā na tiracchānakathākathiko kāyadaḷhibahulo hutvā vihāsiṃ, atha kho pātimokkhasaṃvarādiṃ catubbidhampi sīlaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ achiddaṃ asabalaṃ akammāsaṃ ^a^M0.0244^ea^ bhujissaṃ viññuppasatthaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ katvā paripūrento ariyamaggaṃyeva pāpesi''nti vadati. etena heṭṭhimaphaladvayasampattimattano dīpeti. sotāpannasakadāgāmino hi sīlesu paripūrakārino. ^b^susamāhito camhi ekaggacitto^eb^ti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā sabbathāpi samāhito ca amhi avikkhittacitto. iminā samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāvacanena tatiyaphalasampattimattano dīpeti. anāgāmino hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino. ^b^arahā camhi khīṇāsavo^eb^ti kāmāsavādīnaṃ sabbaso khīṇattā khīṇāsavo, tato eva parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya arahā camhi. etena attano katakaraṇīyataṃ dasseti. ^b^mahiddhiko^eb^ ^a^V0.0219^ea^ ^b^camhi mahānubhāvo^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānavikubbanādīddhīsu mahatā vasībhāvena samannāgatattā mahiddhiko uḷārassa puññānubhāvassa ^a^P0.0269^ea^ guṇānubhāvassa ca sampattiyā mahānubhāvo ca asmi. etena lokiyābhiññānavānupubbavihārasamāpattiyogamattano dīpeti. abhiññāsu vasībhāvena hi ariyā yathicchitanipphādanena mahiddhikā, pubbūpanissayasampattiyā nānāvihārasamāpattīhi ca visodhitasantānattā mahānubhāvā ca hontīti.

[03] ^b^bhaddakaṃ me jīvita^eb^nti evaṃvidhasīlādiguṇasamannāgatassa me yāvāyaṃ kāyo dharati, tāva sattānaṃ hitasukhameva vaḍḍhati, puññakkhettabhāvato jīvitampi me bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ. ^b^bhaddakaṃ maraṇa^eb^nti sace panidaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ ajja vā imasmiṃyeva vā khaṇe anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyati, taṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ parinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ maraṇampi me bhaddakanti ubhayattha tādibhāvaṃ dīpeti. evaṃ mahāthero appahīnasomanassuppilāvitavāsanussannattā uḷārasomanassito dhammabahumānena dhammapītipaṭisaṃvedanena parivitakkesi.
[03] taṃ satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā jīvite maraṇe ca tassa tādibhāvavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``atha kho bhagavā...pe0... udānesī''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ jīvitaṃ na tapatī^eb^ti yaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ jīvitaṃ āyatiṃ khandhappavattiyā sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato na tapati na bādhati, vattamānameva vā ^a^M0.0245^ea^ jīvitaṃ sabbaso saṅkhatadhammattā satipaññāvepullappattiyā sabbattha satisampajaññasamāyogato na bādhati. yo hi andhaputhujjano pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo akatakusalo akatapuñño, so ``akataṃ vata me kalyāṇa''ntiādinā vippaṭisārena tapatīti tassa jīvitaṃ taṃ tapati nāma. itare pana akatapāpā katapuññā kalyāṇaputhujjanena saddhiṃ satta sekhā tapanīyadhammaparivajjanena atapanīyadhammasamannāgamena ca pacchānutāpena na tapantīti na tesaṃ jīvitaṃ tapati. khīṇāsave pana vattabbameva natthīti pavattidukkhavasena atthavaṇṇanā katā.

[03] ^b^maraṇante na socatī^eb^ti maraṇasaṅkhāte ante pariyosāne, maraṇasamīpe vā na socati anāgāmimaggeneva sokassa samugghātitattā. ^b^sa ve diṭṭhapado dhīro, sokamajjhe na socatī^eb^ti so anabhijjhādīnaṃ ^a^P0.0270^ea^ catunnaṃ dhammapadānaṃ nibbānasseva vā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhapado, dhitisampannattā dhīro ^a^V0.0220^ea^ khīṇāsavo socanadhammattā ``sokā''ti laddhanāmānaṃ avītarāgānaṃ sattānaṃ, sokahetūnaṃ vā lokadhammānaṃ majjhe ṭhatvāpi na socati.

[03] idānissa sabbaso sokahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ ^b^``ucchinnabhavataṇhassā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yassa aggamaggena sabbaso ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, so ucchinnabhavataṇho. tassa avasesakilesānaṃ anavasesavūpasamena santacittassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno. ^b^vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro^eb^ti jātiādiko --
[21] ``khandhānañca paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca.
[22] abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, `saṃsāro'ti pavuccatī''ti.. --

[25] vuttalakkhaṇo saṃsāro visesato khīṇo. tasmā ^b^natthi tassa punabbhavo^eb^ti yasmā tassa evarūpassa ariyapuggalassa āyatiṃ punabbhavo natthi, tasmā tassa jātisaṃsāro khīṇo. kasmā panassa punabbhavo natthi? yasmā ucchinnabhavataṇho santacitto ca hoti, tasmāti āvattetvā vattabbaṃ. atha vā vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, tato eva natthi tassa punabbhavoti attho yojetabbo.
[06] navamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M0.0246^ea^ ^b^attano upasama^eb^nti sāvakapāramīmatthakappattiyā hetubhūtaṃ aggamaggena attano anavasesakilesavūpasamaṃ.

[03] āyasmā hi sāriputto anupasantakilesānaṃ sattānaṃ rāgādikilesajanitasantāpadarathapariḷāhadukkhañceva kilesābhisaṅkhāranimittaṃ jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokaparidevādidukkhañca paccakkhato disvā ^a^P0.0271^ea^ atītānāgatepi nesaṃ vaṭṭamūlakadukkhaṃ parituletvā karuṇāyamāno attanāpi puthujjanakāle anubhūtaṃ kilesanimittaṃ vā anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ anussaritvā ``īdisassa ^a^V0.0221^ea^ nāma mahādukkhassa hetubhūtā kilesā idāni me suppahīnā''ti attano kilesavūpasamaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhati. paccavekkhanto ca ``ime ettakā kilesā sotāpattimaggena upasamitā, ettakā sakadāgāmimaggena, ettakā anāgāmimaggena, ettakā arahattamaggena upasamitā''ti taṃtaṃmaggañāṇehi odhiso kilesānaṃ upasamitabhāvaṃ paccavekkhati, tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``attano upasamaṃ paccavekkhamāno''^eb^ti.

[01] apare ``thero arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ paccavekkhitvā `imassa vatāyaṃ santapaṇītabhāvo accantasantāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā ārammaṇato, sayañca sammadeva kilesavūpasamato'ti evaṃ abhiṇhaṃ upasamaṃ paccavekkhatī''ti vadanti. aññe pana ``anavasesakilesānaṃ upasamapariyosāne jātaṃ aggaphalamevettha upasamo nāma, taṃ paccavekkhamāno nisinno''ti.

[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ viditvā^eb^ti yadidaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa mahāpaññatādihetubhūtaṃ sāvakesu anaññasādhāraṇaṃ kilesappahānaṃ aggaphalaṃ vā upasamapariyāyena vuttaṃ, tassa paccavekkhaṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadanubhāvadīpakaṃ ^b^imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^upasantasantacittassā^eb^ti upasantameva hutvā santaṃ cittaṃ etassāti upasantasantacitto. samāpattiyā vikkhambhanena hi upasantakilesattā upasantacittaṃ na sabbathā ``upasantasanta''nti vuccati tassa upasamassa anaccantikabhāvato, na tathā aggamaggena. tena pana accantameva kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā arahato cittaṃ puna kilesānaṃ anupasametabbatāya samathavipassanāheṭṭhimamaggehi upasantakilesaṃ hutvā accantasantabhāvatova ^a^M0.0247^ea^ ``upasantasanta''nti vuccati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``upasantameva hutvā santaṃ cittaṃ etassāti upasantasantacitto''ti. ^b^upasanta^eb^nti vā upasamo vuccati, tasmā ``upasantasantacittassā''ti accantūpasamena santacittassāti attho.

[03] atha vā satipi sabbesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ anavasesakilesavūpasame sāvakapāramīñāṇassa pana matthakappattihetubhūto sāvakesu anaññasādhāraṇo saviseso dhammasenāpatino ^a^P0.0272^ea^ kilesavūpasamoti dassetuṃ satthā upasantasaddena visesetvā āha ``upasantasantacittassā''ti.

[03] tatrāyamattho -- bhusaṃ daḷhaṃ vā santaṃ upasantaṃ, tena upasantena upasantameva hutvā santaṃ upasantasantaṃ ^a^V0.0222^ea^, tādisaṃ cittaṃ etassāti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva. tathā hesa bhagavatā -- ``sāriputto, bhikkhave, mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.93) anekapariyāyena vaṇṇito thomito. ^b^netticchinnassā^eb^ti netti vuccati bhavataṇhā saṃsārassa nayanato, sā netti chinnā etassāti netticchinno. tassa netticchinnassa, pahīnataṇhassāti attho. ^b^mutto so mārabandhanā^eb^ti so evaṃvidho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sabbasmā mārabandhanato mutto, na tassa mārabandhanamocanāya karaṇīyaṃ atthi, tasmā dhammasenāpati attano upasamaṃ paccavekkhatīti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] dasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] niṭṭhitā ca meghiyavaggavaṇṇanā.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ mahāvaggassa ^a^V0.0223^ea^ ^a^M0.0248^ea^ ^a^P0.0273^ea^ paṭhame ^b^mallikāya deviyā saddhi^eb^nti mallikāya nāma attano mahesiyā saha. ^b^uparipāsādavaragato^eb^ti pāsādavarassa upari gato. ^b^kocañño attanā piyataro^eb^ti koci añño attanā piyāyitabbataro. ^b^atthi nu kho te^eb^ti ``kiṃ te atthī''ti deviṃ pucchati.

[03] kasmā pucchati? ayañhi sāvatthiyaṃ duggatamālākārassa dhītā. ekadivasaṃ āpaṇato pūvaṃ gahetvā mālārāmaṃ gantvā ``khādissāmī''ti gacchantī paṭipathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacittā taṃ bhagavato adāsi. satthā tathārūpe ṭhāne nisīdanākāraṃ dassesi. ānandatthero cīvaraṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. bhagavā tattha nisīditvā taṃ pūvaṃ paribhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. thero ``ko imissā, bhante, dānassa vipāko bhavissatī''ti pucchi. ``ajjesā, ānanda, tathāgatassa paṭhamaṃ bhojanaṃ adāsi, ajjeva kosalarañño aggamahesī bhavissati piyā manāpā''ti. taṃ divasameva ca rājā kāsigāme bhāgineyyena saddhiṃ yujjhitvā parājito palāyitvā āgato nagaraṃ pavisanto ``balakāyassa āgamanaṃ āgamessāmī''ti taṃ mālārāmaṃ pāvisi. sā rājānaṃ āgataṃ passitvā tassa vattamakāsi. rājā tassā vatte pasīditvā pitaraṃ pakkosāpetvā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ datvā ^a^P0.0274^ea^ taṃ antepuraṃ paṭiharāpetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. athekadivasaṃ rājā cintesi -- ``mayā imissā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ dinnaṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ puccheyyaṃ `ko te piyo'ti? sā `tvaṃ me, mahārāja, piyo'ti vatvā, puna maṃ pucchissati, athassāhaṃ `mayhampi tvaṃyeva piyā'ti vakkhāmī''ti. iti so aññamaññaṃ vissāsajananatthaṃ sammodanīyaṃ karonto pucchi.

[03] devī pana paṇḍitā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā saṅghupaṭṭhāyikā ``nāyaṃ pañho rañño mukhaṃ ulloketvā ^a^V0.0224^ea^ kathetabbo''ti cintetvā yathābhūtameva vadantī ^b^``natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro''^eb^ti ^a^M0.0249^ea^ āha. vatvāpi attanā byākatamatthaṃ upāyena rañño paccakkhaṃ kātukāmā ^b^``tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro''^eb^ti tatheva rājānaṃ pucchi yathā raññā sayaṃ puṭṭhā. rājāpi tāya sarasalakkhaṇena kathitattā nivattituṃ asakkonto sayampi sarasalakkhaṇeneva kathento tatheva byākāsi yathā deviyā byākataṃ.

[03] byākaritvā ca mandadhātukatāya evaṃ cintesi -- ``ahaṃ rājā pathavissaro mahantaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ abhivijiya ajjhāvasāmi, mayhaṃ tāva yuttaṃ `attanā piyataraṃ aññaṃ na passāmī'ti, ayaṃ pana vasalī hīnajaccā samānā mayā ucce ṭhāne ṭhapitā sāmibhūtaṃ maṃ na tathā piyāyati, `attāva piyataro'ti mama sammukhā vadati, yāva kakkhaḷā vatāya''nti anattamano hutvā ``nanu te tīṇi ratanāni piyatarānī''ti codesi. devī `ratanattayaṃpāhaṃ deva attano saggasukhaṃ mokkhasukhañca patthayantī sampiyāyāmi, tasmā attāva me piyataro''ti āha. sabbo cāyaṃ loko attadatthameva paraṃ piyāyati, puttaṃ patthentopi ``ayaṃ maṃ jiṇṇakāle posessatī''ti pattheti, dhītaraṃ ``mama kulaṃ vaḍḍhissatī''ti, bhariyaṃ ``mayhaṃ pāde paricarissatī''ti, aññepi ñātimittabandhave taṃtaṃkiccavasena, iti attadatthameva ^a^P0.0275^ea^ sampassanto loko paraṃ piyāyatīti. ayañhi deviyā adhippāyo.

[03] atha rājā cintesi -- ``ayaṃ mallikā kusalā paṇḍitā nipuṇā `attāva me piyataro'ti vadati, mayhampi attāva piyataro hutvā upaṭṭhāti, handāhaṃ imamatthaṃ satthu ārocessāmi, yathā ca me satthā byākarissati, tathā naṃ dhāressāmī''ti. evaṃ pana cintetvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. tena vuttaṃ -- ^b^``atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo...pe0... piyataro''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ ``loke sabbasattānaṃ attāva attano piyataro''ti raññā vuttamatthaṃ sabbaso jānitvā tadatthaparidīpanaṃ ^b^imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasā^eb^ti sabbā anavasesā dasapi disā pariyesanavasena cittena anugantvā. ^b^nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvacī^eb^ti attanā atisayena piyaṃ aññaṃ koci puriso sabbussāhena pariyesanto ^a^M0.0250^ea^ kvaci katthaci sabbadisāsu neva adhigaccheyya na passeyya. ^b^evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresa^eb^nti evaṃ kassaci attanā piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena ^a^V0.0225^ea^ puthu visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attāva piyo. ^b^tasmā na hiṃse paramattakāmo^eb^ti yasmā evaṃ sabbopi satto attānaṃ piyāyati attano sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo, tasmā attakāmo attano hitasukhaṃ icchanto paraṃ sattaṃ antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya na hiṃse na haneyya na pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhipi viheṭheyya. parassa hi attanā kate dukkhe taṃ tato saṅkamantaṃ viya kālantare attani sandissati. ayañhi kammānaṃ dhammatāti.
[06] paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P0.0276^ea^ ^b^acchariyaṃ, bhante^eb^ti idampi meghiyasutte viya garahaṇacchariyavasena veditabbaṃ. ^b^yāva appāyukā^eb^ti yattakaṃ parittāyukā, atīttarajīvitāti attho. ^b^sattāhajāte^eb^ti sattāhena jāto sattāhajāto. tasmiṃ sattāhajāte, jātassa sattame ahanīti attho. ^b^tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapajjī^eb^ti tusitaṃ devanikāyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena upapajji.

[03] ekadivasaṃ kira thero pacchābhattaṃ divāṭṭhāne nisinno lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ dassanānuttariyabhūtaṃ bhagavato rūpakāyasiriṃ manasi karitvā, ``aho buddhānaṃ rūpakāyasampatti dassanīyā samantapāsādikā manoharā''ti uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento evaṃ cintesi -- ``vijātamātuyā nāma virūpopi putto surūpo viya manāpo hoti, sace pana buddhānaṃ mātā mahāmāyā devī dhareyya, kīdisaṃ nu kho tassā bhagavato rūpadassane pītisomanassaṃ uppajjeyya, mahājāni kho mayhaṃ mahāmātu deviyā, yā sattāhajāte bhagavati kālakatā''ti. evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano parivitakkitaṃ ārocento tassā kālakiriyaṃ garahanto ^b^``acchariyaṃ, bhante''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] keci ^a^M0.0251^ea^ panāhu -- ``mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ mahatā āyāsena pabbajjaṃ yācitvāpi paṭikkhittā, mayā pana upāyena yācito bhagavā aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇavasena tassā pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca anujāni, sā te dhamme paṭiggahetvā laddhapabbajjūpasampadā bhagavato dutiyaṃ parisaṃ uppādetvā catutthāya parisāya paccayo ahosi. sace pana bhagavato janetti ^a^V0.0226^ea^ mahāmāyā devī dhareyya, evametā cubhopi khattiyabhaginiyo ekato hutvā imaṃ sāsanaṃ sobheyyuṃ, bhagavā ca mātari bahumānena mātugāmassa sāsane pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca sukheneva anujāneyya, appāyukatāya panassā kasirena nipphannamidanti iminā adhippāyena thero bhagavato santike ^b^`acchariyaṃ, bhante'^eb^tiādimāhā''ti. taṃ akāraṇaṃ. bhagavā hi mātuyā vā aññassa vā mātugāmassa attano sāsane ^a^P0.0277^ea^ pabbajjaṃ anujānanto garukaṃyeva katvā anujānāti, na lahukaṃ ciraṭṭhitikāmatāyāti.

[03] apare panāhu -- ``dasabalacatuvesārajjādike anaññasādhāraṇe anantāparimāṇe buddhaguṇe thero manasi karitvā yā evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ nāma loke aggapuggalaṃ satthāraṃ kucchinā dasa māse parihari, sā buddhamātā kassaci paricārikā bhavissatīti ayuttamidaṃ. kasmā? satthu guṇānucchavikamevetaṃ, yadidaṃ sattāhajāte bhagavati janetti kālaṃ karoti, kālakatā ca tusitesu uppajjatīti acchariyabbhutacittajāto hutvā taṃ attano vitakkuppādanaṃ bhagavato ārocento ^b^`acchariyaṃ, bhante'^eb^tiādivacanaṃ avocā''ti.

[03] satthā pana yasmā sattāhajātesu bodhisattesu bodhisattamātu kālakiriyā dhammatā siddhā, tasmā taṃ dhammataṃ paridīpento ^b^``evametaṃ, ānandā''^eb^tiādimāha. sā panāyaṃ dhammatā yasmā yathā sabbe bodhisattā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi sannipatitvā abhisambodhiṃ pattuṃ manussaloke paṭisandhiggahaṇāya ajjhesitā kāladīpadesakulāni viya janettiyā āyuparimāṇampi oloketvā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti, ayampi bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tatheva tusitapure ṭhito pañca mahāvilokanāni vilokento sattadivasādhikadasamāsaparimāṇaṃ ^a^M0.0252^ea^ mātuyā āyuparimāṇaṃ paricchinditvā ``ayaṃ mama paṭisandhiggahaṇassa kālo, idāni uppajjituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti ñatvāva paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi, tasmā sabbabodhisattānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇavaseneva veditabbaṃ. tenāha bhagavā -- ^b^``appāyukā hi, ānanda, bodhisattamātaro hontī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^kālaṃ karontī^eb^ti yathāvuttāayuparikkhayeneva kālaṃ karonti, na vijātapaccayā. carimattabhāvehi bodhisattehi vasitaṭṭhānaṃ cetiyagharasadisaṃ hoti, na aññesaṃ paribhogārahaṃ, na ca sakkā bodhisattamātaraṃ apanetvā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapetunti tattakaṃ eva bodhisattamātu āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti, tasmā tadā kālaṃ karonti. imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya mahābodhisattā pañcamaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ karonti.

[03] katarasmiṃ ^a^V0.0227^ea^ pana vaye kālaṃ ^a^P0.0278^ea^ karontīti? majjhimavaye. paṭhamavayasmiñhi sattānaṃ attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hoti, tena tadā sañjātagabbhā itthiyo yebhuyyena gabbhaṃ anurakkhituṃ na sakkonti. gaṇheyyuṃ ce, gabbho bahvābādho hoti. majjhimavayassa pana dve koṭṭhāse atikkamitvā tatiyakoṭṭhāse vatthu visadaṃ hoti, visade vatthumhi nibbattadārakā arogā honti, tasmā bodhisattamātaro paṭhamavaye sampattiṃ anubhavitvā majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse vijāyitvā kālaṃ karontīti.

[03] ^b^etamatthaṃ viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ bodhisattamātu aññesañca sabbasattānaṃ attabhāve āyussa maraṇapariyosānataṃ viditvā tadatthavibhāvanamukhena anavajjappaṭipattiyaṃ ussāhadīpakaṃ ^b^imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti aniyamaniddeso. ^b^bhūtā^eb^ti nibbattā. ^b^bhavissantī^eb^ti anāgate nibbattissanti. ^b^vā^eb^saddo vikappattho, ^b^api^eb^saddo sampiṇḍanattho. tena nibbattamānepi saṅgaṇhāti. ettāvatā atītādivasena tiyaddhapariyāpanne satte anavasesato pariyādiyati. apica gabbhaseyyakasattā gabbhato nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya bhūtā nāma, tato pubbe bhavissanti nāma. saṃsedajūpapātikā paṭisandhicittato parato bhūtā ^a^M0.0253^ea^ nāma, tato pubbe uppajjitabbabhavavasena bhavissanti nāma. sabbepi vā paccuppannabhavavasena bhūtā nāma, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena bhavissanti nāma. khīṇāsavā bhūtā nāma. te hi bhūtā eva, na puna bhavissantīti, tadaññe bhavissanti nāma.

[03] ^b^sabbe gamissanti pahāya deha^eb^nti sabbe yathāvuttabhedā sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsādivasena anekabhedabhinnā sattā dehaṃ attano sarīraṃ pahāya nikkhipitvā paralokaṃ gamissanti, asekkhā pana nibbānaṃ. ettha koci acavanadhammo nāma natthīti dasseti. ^b^taṃ sabbajāniṃ kusalo viditvā^eb^ti tadetaṃ sabbassa sattassa jāniṃ hāniṃ maraṇaṃ, sabbassa vā sattassa jāniṃ vināsaṃ pabhaṅgutaṃ kusalo paṇḍitajātiko maraṇānussativasena aniccatāmanasikāravasena vā jānitvā. ^b^ātāpiyo brahmacariyaṃ careyyā^eb^ti vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ātāpiyasaṅkhātena ^a^P0.0279^ea^ vīriyena samannāgatattā ātāpiyo catubbidhasammappadhānavasena āraddhavīriyo anavasesamaraṇasamatikkamanūpāyaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ careyya, paṭipajjeyyāti attho.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
